178b4(mdo sde): dag bzod pa dang po'i khyad par ro// de la gzungs rnams yongs su snang bar 'gyur// snang ba de la nam yang the tsom med// bden pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i tshig smras te// 'di dag bzod pa dang
178b5(mdo sde): po'i khyad par ro// rlung dang chu dang med dang sa rnams kyi// khams bzhi po'i ni rnam pa gzhan 'gyur yang // sangs rgyas byang chub las ni de mi ldog/ 'di dag bzod pa dang po'i khyad par ro//
178b6(mdo sde): 'jig rten bzo gnas mang po ci yod pa// thams cad byang chub sems dpa' des bslabs te// bdag las lhag pa su yang mi mthong ba// 'di dag bzod pa dang po'i khyad par ro// zhi gnas
178b7(mdo sde): stobs kyis bskyod pa med gyur cing // lhag mthong gis ni bo lta bur gyur// sems can kun gyis 'khrugs par mi nus te// de ni bzod pa gnyis su bshad pa yin// mnyam par gzhag
179a1(mdo sde): bzhin du ni ldang zhing zla// mnyam par gzhag pas 'jug cing 'chag pabyed/ mkhas pa ting nge 'dzin gyi la rol byin/ 'di dag bzod pa gnyis pa'i khyad par
179a2(mdo sde): mnyam par gzhag pas mngon shes lnga 'job ste/ chos rnams ston ci ba ning ni brgyar yang 'gro/ don rdzu 'phrul stobs las mi rnams te/ 'di dag bzod pa gnyis
179a3(mdo sde): pa'i khyad par ro// de ni de 'dra'i ting 'dzin ni bsten/ mnyam par bzhag pa de mi sems kyi tshod// 'dzin nus pa yi sems can gang yang med// 'di dag bzod pa gnyis pa'i
179a4(mdo sde): khyad pa'i ro// 'jig rten 'di na gang yod sems can kun/ de dag sangs rgyas mkhyen pas chos ston kyang // bshad pa thams cad de dag 'dzin nus te// 'di
179a5(mdo sde): dag bzod pa gnyis pa'i khyad par ro// shar dang lho dang nub dang byang phyogs dang // steng dang 'og dang de bzhin phyogs mtshams ni// thams cad na yang 'jig rten mgon po mthong /
179a6(mdo sde): de ni bzod pa gsum par bstan pa yin// gser gyi kha dog lta bu sku lus su// 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab sprul nas ni// srog chags bye ba mngal chos ston te// 'di dag bzod
179a7(mdo sde): pa gsum pa'i khyad par ro// sangs rgyas zhing 'di'i 'dzam bu'i gling kun na// byang chub sems dpa' de ni snang bar 'gyur// 'jig rten lha dang lha min bcas par grags// 'di dag
179b1(mdo sde): bzod pa gsum pa'i khyad par ro// sangs rgyas spyod yul de bzhin cho ga dang // bde bar gshegs pa'i sgong lam ci 'jab/ kun la byang chub sems dpa' des bsrabs te// 'di da /
179b2(mdo sde): bzod pa gsum pa'i khyad par ro// 'jig rten khams 'ang sems can ci yod pas// byang chub sems dpa' bsngags pa brjod gyur la// de la yid ni rjes su dgar byed na// sangs
179b3(mdo sde): rgyas ye shes la ni bslabs ma yin// 'jig rten khams 'di'i sems can su yod pas// byang chub sems dpa' la ni mi snyan brjod// de dag la ni yid kyis khro byed na// da dung sangs
179b4(mdo sde): rgyas ye shes des ma bslabs// nor rnyed pas ni yid bder mi 'gyur te// nor rnams ma rnyed na yang mi dga' med// ri dang 'dra ba'i sems la rtag tu gnas// 'di dag bzod pa gsum
179b5(mdo sde): pa'i khyad par ro// sgra yi rjes 'gro bzod pa 'di bstan te// bsam pa sgom pa rjes su mthun pa dang // thos pa las byung de ni skye ba med// 'di la gang bslab de ni byang chub 'am/
179b6(mdo sde): bzod pa bla na med pa gsum po 'di// byang chub sems dpa' nam zhig thob gyur na// mi mchog bde bar gshegs pa des mthong ste// rdul med byang chub tu'ang de lung ston// de nas lung
179b7(mdo sde): bstan pa ni de thos nas// sa yang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos// zhing rnams 'od kyis shin tu gsal bar 'gyur// lha rnams bye ba me tog char pa 'bebs// de la lung bstan de yang thos
180a1(mdo sde): nas ni// sems can bye ba khrag khrig bsam yas kyang // bdag cag mchod rten rgyal bar 'gyur snyam ste/ byang chub dam pa mchog la sems sder 'gyur/
180a2(mdo sde): nam zhig bla med bzod pa gsum po 'di// byang chub sems dpas thob par gyur pa na// de ni mi skye 'chi bar mi 'gyur te// de la 'chi 'pho med cing skye ba'ang med// nam zhig bla med bzod pa
180a3(mdo sde): gsum po 'di// rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpas thob gyur na// skye ba dang ni 'chi ba'ang mi mthong ste// chos rnams thams cad chos nyid gnas par mthong // 'di ltar mi bden par ni
180a4(mdo sde): des rig ste// chos rnams sgyu ma lta bur rang bzhin stong // stong pa dag kyang mi mthong 'chi ba'ang med// chos 'di thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong // nam zhig la las de la gus byas shing /
180a5(mdo sde): rim gro bkur bsti mchod pa byas na yang // de la yid ni dga' bar mi byed de// chos rnams rang bzhin stong par de yis shes// sems can dag gis spyos bsdigs brdegs na yang // de dag
180a6(mdo sde): la ni nga rgyal khro mi srid// de dag sems can thar par bya ba'i phyir// de dag la ni byams pa brtan par bskyed// rdo dang dbyug pa dag gis brdegs btsog kyang // mkhas pa de la khro bar
180a7(mdo sde): mi byed de// bdag med bsod la rab tu gnas pa la// nga rgyal dang mi dro ba'i za ba med// 'di ltar des ni mi bden nyid du shes// sgyu ma lta bur chos rnams rang bzhin stong // chos tshul re
180b1(mdo sde): 'drab la de gnas na/ lhar bcas 'jig rten dag na shin tu bkur// nam zhig sems can dag ni mtshon thogs nas// de yi lus dang yan lag mang btubs kyang // de dag la ni yid kyis
180b2(mdo sde): khro ba med// snying rje byams pa las kyang nyams mi 'gyur// de dag lus dang yan lag gcod pa'i tshe// de ni de la 'di ltar sems bskyed de// 'di dag byang chub mchog pa ma bkod par
180b3(mdo sde): de srid zhi bar mya ngan nga mi 'da'// de 'dra'i bzod stabs bla na med pa la// bdag med bzod pa mnyam nyid gnas pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' grag pa chen po yis// bskal pa bye bar
180b4(mdo sde): rtag tu shin tu bsgoms// de las lhag par bad+ma'i bye snyed du// ji tsam sangs rgyas mkhyen pas don mi byed// de srid byang chub reg pa ma yin na// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes ci zhig smos/
180b5(mdo sde): grags pa chen po brjod pa mtha' yas pa// bdag med bzod la rab tu gnas pa yi// bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab brgyar brjod kyang // de yi bsngags pa za bar sla ba min// de phyir byang
180b6(mdo sde): chub mchog rab bla na med// ye shes phung po 'tshang rgyar su 'dod pa// de ni rgyal bas bsngags pa'i bzod pa bsgoms// byang chub dam pa rnyed par dka' mi 'gyur// bzod pa la 'jug
180b7(mdo sde): pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa gzhon nu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa'
181a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dod cing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas chos thams
181a2(mdo sde): cad kyi dngos po med pa'i ngo kyi ye shes la mkhas par bya'o// gnon nu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ chos thams cad kyi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis ye shes la
181a3(mdo sde): mkhas pa yin zhe na/ gzhon nu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad dngos po med pa/ ngo bo nyid med pa/ mtshan ma med pa/ mtshan nyid med pa/ ma
181a4(mdo sde): skyes pa ma 'gags pa yi ge med pa spong ba/ gzod ma nas zhi ba rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa yin par rab tu shes par bya'o// gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems
181a5(mdo sde): dpa' chen pos nam chos thams cad dngos po med pa ngo bo nyid med pamatshan ma med pa mtshan nyid med pa/ ma skyes pa/ ma 'gags pa/ yi ge med pa
181a6(mdo sde): stong pa gzod ma nas zhi ba/ rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa yin par rab tu shes par gyur pa de'i tshe/ gnon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du
181a7(mdo sde): chos thams cad kyi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi ye shes la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ chos thams cad kyi dngos po med pa'i ngo
181b1(mdo sde): cad kyi ma shes la sangs pa ni gzugs dang / swa dang / de dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos thams cad la 'dod chags par mi byed/ zhe snang bar mi byed/ gti mug par mabyang /
181b2(mdo sde): ro/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des chos de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing / chos de mi dmigs te/ gang 'dod chags dang / gang la 'dod chags pa dang / gang gis 'dzin
181b3(mdo sde): chags pa dang / gang zhe sdang ba dang / gang la zhe sdang ba dang / gang gis zhe sdang ba dang / gang gti mug pa dang / gang la gti mug pa dang / gang gis gti mug par 'gyur ba'i chos
181b4(mdo sde): de des yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing mi dmigs so// chos de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing ma dmigs na khams gsum thams cad la ma chags par 'gyur te/ myur
181b5(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob po/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ chos rnams thams cad dngos po
181b6(mdo sde): med pa ste/ thams cad mtshan ma med cing mtshan nyid med / skyes pa med cing 'gags pa med par yang // de ltar chos rnams shin tu rig par gyis// thams cad dngos po med cing
181b7(mdo sde): yi ge med// stong pa zhi ba bzod nas dri ma med// de ltar chos rnams gang gis shes pa ni/ gzhon nu de ni sangs rgyas zhes kyang brjod// de phyir rang bzhin mnyam nyid rnam par spros// ngo bo
182a1(mdo sde): nyid kyis chos kun rang bzhin med// bde bar gshegs pa'i yum 'di su 'dod pa// rgyal ba rnams kyi yul 'di thob par 'gyur// gzhon nu de lta bas ra
182a2(mdo sde): rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ gzhon nu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa grangs med pa bas kyang ches grangs med pa/ rgya che ba/ gzhal du med pa
182a3(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ tshad med par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ dngos po med pa las byung ba zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
182a4(mdo sde): rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rjer mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha drang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom
182a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das dngos po med pa las byung ba zhes bya bar 'jig rten du blang nga // gzhon nu 'di ji snyam du sems ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de dngos po med pa las byung ba
182a6(mdo sde): zhes bya zhe na/ gzhon nu de bzhin gshegs pa de skyes ma thag tu stang ga nam mkha' la ta la bdun tsam du 'phags nas/ gom pa bdun bor te/ tshig 'di skad gsung ngo //
182a7(mdo sde): chos thams cad dngos po med pa las byung ba'o// chos thams cad dngos po med pa las byung ba'o zhes gsungs te/ gzhon nu sgra de'i dbyangs kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
182b1(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi mas par byas / de nas sa'i sa kA rlung / tshangs pa 'jig rten gyi ga sa ska bsgrags nga ngas kyis rjes sa so par bya /
182b2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa 'di skyes ma thag tu steng gi nam mtha' la tal bdun srid du 'phags nas/ skom pa bdun por te/ dngos po med pa'i sgra 'dren pa las ni dngos po me
182b3(mdo sde): pa las 'byung ba zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes mtshan dngos po med pa las byungab/ dngos po med pa las byung ba'i zhes btags so// bcom ldan 'das de byang chub thob par
182b4(mdo sde): shing thams cad kyi lo ma dang / rtswa dang shing gel pa dang / nags chos thams cad dang / ri'i rtse mo thams cad las kyang dngos po med pa las byung ba zhes sgra byung ngo // 'jig
182b5(mdo sde): rten gyi khams de na sbyar btags pa ji snyed yod pa thams cad las dngos po med pa las byung ba zhes rnam par rig par rig par byed pa'i sgra byung ngo // gzhon nu de'i tshe de'i dus na
182b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dngos po med pa las byung ba de'i gsung rab la/ rgyal bu gzhon nu snying rje chen po sems shes
182b7(mdo sde): bya ba gzugs bzang zhing mdzes pa bstan sdug pa zhig byung ngo // gzhon nu de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu snying rje chen po sems de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra tsas
183a1(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dngos po med pa las byung ba gal ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal
183a2(mdo sde): te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ phyogs cig tu 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
183a3(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas dngos po med pa las byung bas rgyal bu gzhon nu snying rje chen po sems kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas ting nge 'dzin 'di bshad do// ting nge 'dzin 'di thos nas rab tu dad de//
183a4(mdo sde): sems rab tu dad pas skra dang kha spu bregs te/ gos ngur smrig gyon nas/ dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo // de rab tu byung nas ting nge 'dzin 'di bzung /
183a5(mdo sde): ste bzung zhing bcangs bklags kun chub par byas nasabasgom pa'i rnal 'byor la rjes su brtson par gnas te/ de dge ba'i rtsa ba des bskal pa bye ba phrag nyi shu nam yang
183a6(mdo sde): ngan 'gro log par ltung bar ma song ngo // sangs rgyas bye ba phrag nyi shu mnyes par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad las kyang ting nge 'dzin 'di mnyan to// sangs rgyas de dag
183a7(mdo sde): la mnyan nas kyang bzung ngo // kun chub par byas so// bcangs so// klags so// bton to// nyon mongs pa med par bsgoms shing mang du byas te/ bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor la rjes su
183b1(mdo sde): brtson par gnas so// dedage pa'i phra bdes bskas pa ci shu 'das nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don legs par bsam pa zhes byab 'dzin
183b2(mdo sde): rkyen du byung ste/ des sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa yongs su smin par byas/ sems can tshad med pa'i don byas nas/ de'i 'og tu shing zad pa'i me ltar yongs su mya ngan pas 'das/
183b3(mdo sde): so// gzhon nu de lta bas na/ rnam grangs des kyang / 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi gces spras byed pa ste/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes
183b4(mdo sde): bla na med pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin par rig par bya'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de'i tshe zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la sngon byung ba'i le'u 'di nyid rgyas par
183b5(mdo sde): tshogs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan to// sngon 'das dus kyi bskal pa bsam yas na// mi yi gtso bo byung ba ngas dran te// drang srong chen po gzings kyis
183b6(mdo sde): don mdzad pa// de ming dngos po med las byung zhes bya// skyes ma thag tu mkha' la rab 'dug nas// chos rnams thams cad dngos po med par bstan// de tshe de dang mthun par mtshan
183b7(mdo sde): btags te// sgra ni 'jig rten kun la grags par byas// lha rnams thams cad rab tu sgra 'byin pa// dngos po med ces bya ba'i rgyal bar 'gyur// skyes ma thag tu gom pa bdun bor te/
184a1(mdo sde): rgyal bas chos rnams dngos po med par bshad// thub pa chos rnams thams cad ston pa yi// sangs rgyas chos kyi rgyal por nam 'gyur ro// rtsi shing dgel ba ri dang /
184a2(mdo sde): brag rnams las// chos rnams dngos po med ces sgra yang byung // 'jig rten den ji snyed sgra yod pa// thams cad dngos med ci yang med pa zhes// de lta bur ni 'jig rten 'dun pa yi//
184a3(mdo sde): sgra dbyangs rnam pa shin tu byung bar gyur// de'i dus na rgyal po'i bu skyes pa// ming ni rtag tu snying rje sems shes bya// shin tu gzugs bzang blta na sdug pa zhig/ rgyal ba de yi drung du nyer
184a4(mdo sde): 'ongs te// thub pa khyu mchog zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas// ri ma bcas pas bskor ba byas nas ni// rdul bral bla na med pa'i chos mnyan phyir// rab tu dang ba'i sems kyis der 'dug
184a5(mdo sde): rgyal ba dpa' bo des ni bsam mkhyen nas// ting 'dzin 'di ni rab tu bshad pa mdzad// des ni rdul bral ting 'dzin 'di thos nas// rgyal mchog bstan la mur bar rab tu byung // rab tu
184a6(mdo sde): de byung ting 'dzin 'di yang ni/ bzung zhing bklags te yongs su chub byas pas// bskal pa bye ba nyi shu tshang bar ni// log par lhung ba'i sar yang yongam song // de ni dge bar bya ba'i las
184a7(mdo sde): de yis// sangs rgyas bye phrag nyi shu mnyes par byas// rgyal ba de dag kun gyi drung du yang // ting 'dzin zhi mchog 'di ni goms par byas// de phyis 'jig rten du yang sangs rgyas gyur/
184b1(mdo sde): ming ni don legs bsams shes rtag tu brjod// sems can bye ba mang po'i don byas nas// phyi ma'i dus la me bzhin mya ngan 'das// dngos po med pa las byung ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//
184b2(mdo sde): 'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mdo// bam po gsum pa/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ zla 'od gnon nur gyur pa la
184b3(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ji ltar na bdag myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
184b4(mdo sde): par 'tshang rgya zhing / sems can thams cad srid pa'i rgya mtsho las bsgral bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsngags pa/ de bzhin
184b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par smos pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po 'di mnyan par bya/ gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ kun chu
184b6(mdo sde): bar bya/ klag par bya/ rab tu gton par bya/ lung mnod cing kha ton du bya/ nyon mongs pa med par sgom pas bsgom par bya/ mang du bya/ gzhan la yang rgya cher rab tu bstan
184b7(mdo sde): par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhon nu chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
185a1(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams sred pa ste/ 'di las de bzhin gshegs pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad byung ngo // gzhon nu de lta bsan
185a2(mdo sde): khyod kyis kyang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsngags pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bskyed pa/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal
185a3(mdo sde): po gzung bar bya'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ de'i phyir byang chub tu ni 'tshang rgya zhing / sring pa'i mtsho las sems can sgrol 'dod pas// sangs rgyas bsngags pa'i mdo sde 'di
185a4(mdo sde): zung shig/ byang chub dam pa rnyed par dka' mi 'gyur// de ras yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa'
185a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dod cing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas chos zab mo bzod pa la mkhas par bya'o//
185a6(mdo sde): gzhon nu ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos zab mo bzod pa la mkhas pa yin zhe na/ gzhon nu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
185a7(mdo sde): chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur rab tu shes par bya'o// chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / brag cha lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / chu zla lta bu dang / sprul
185b1(mdo sde): pa lta bu dang / gzugs brnyan lta bu dang / nam mkha' lta bur rab tu shes par bya'o// gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos nam chos thams cad sgyum lta bu yongs su
185b2(mdo sde): shes shing / chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / brag cha lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / chu zla lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu dang / gzugs brnyan lta bu dang /
185b3(mdo sde): nam mkha' lta bur yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes pa de'i tshe/ gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di chos zab mo bzod pa la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// chos zab
185b4(mdo sde): mo bzod pa dang ldan pa de/ 'dod chags par 'gyur ba'i chos la mi chags zhe sdang bar 'gyur ba'i chos la mi sdang / gti mug par 'gyur ba'i chos la mi myong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/
185b5(mdo sde): 'di ltar des chos de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / chos de mi dmigs te/ gang 'dod chags pa dang / gang la 'dod chags pa dang / gang gis 'dod chags pa dang / gang zhe sdang
185b6(mdo sde): ba dang / gang la zhe sdang ba dang / gang gis zhe sdang ba dang / gang gti mug pa dang / gang la gti mug pa dang / gang gis gti mug par 'gyur ba'i chos de des yang dag par rjes su mi
185b7(mdo sde): mthong zhing chos de mi dmigs so// chos de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing mi dmigs pas/ 'dod chags pa med pa/ zhe sdang ba med pa/ gti mug pa med pa sems
186a1(mdo sde): phyin cim lon pa/ mnyam par gzhas pa zhes bran// spros pa med pa zhes bya'o// rgal ba pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// sam la phyin pa zhes bya'o// bde
186a2(mdo sde): son pa zhes bya'o// mi 'jigs pa thob pa zhes bya'o// tshul khrims can zhes bya'o// ye shes can zhes bya'o// shes rab can zhes bya'o// bsod nams can zhes bya'o// rdzu 'phrul
186a3(mdo sde): can zhes bya'o// dran pa can zhes bya'o// blo gros can zhes bya'o// rtog pa can zhes bya'o// ngo tsha shes pa dang ldan pa zhes bya'o// brtan pa dang ldan pa zhes bya'o// smyon
186a4(mdo sde): pa dang ldan pa zhes bya'o// sbyangs pa'i yon tan yo byad bsnyungs pa dang ldan pa zhes bya'o// nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya'o// ci'ang med pa zhes bya'o// dgra bcom pa zhes bya'o//
186a5(mdo sde): zag pa zad pa zhes bya'o// tshon mongs pa med pa/ dbang dang ldan par gyur pa sems shin tu rnam par grol ba shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/ cang shes pa/ klang
186a6(mdo sde): po chen po bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba bdag gi don rjes su thob pa srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par
186a7(mdo sde): grol ba/ shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i dge sbyong zhes bya'o// bram ze zhes bya'o// khrus byas pa zhes bya'o//
186b1(mdo sde): dus banas drug/ ga par byed pa / cang thams 'o// sangs rgyas byams / bya rgyas sa rgya/ nga ra zugs papas
186b2(mdo sde): rnams ma rnam pa zhes bya'o// 'ongs las rgal ba zhes bya'o// zug rngu phyung ba zhes bya'o// nad med pa zhes bya'o// dge slong zhes bya'o// kun nas dkris pa med pa zhes bya'o//
186b3(mdo sde): skyes bu zhes bya'o// skyes bu dam pa zhes bya'o// skyes bu mchog ces bya'o// skyes bu chen po zhes bya'o// skyes bu seng ge zhes bya'o// skyes bu glang po che zhes bya'o// skyes bu cang shes pa
186b4(mdo sde): zhes bya'o// skyes bu ldid khyer ba zhes bya'o// skyes bu dpa' bo zhes bya'o// skyes bu rtsal po che zhes bya'o// skyes bu me tog ces bya'o// skyes bu pad+ma zhes bya'o// skyes bu pad+ma dkar po
186b5(mdo sde): zhes bya'o// skyes bu 'dul ba zhes bya'o// skyes bu zla ba zhes bya'o// skyes bu phal ba ma yin pa zhes bya'o// mi gos pa zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
186b6(mdo sde): chos zab mo'i bzod pa la 'jug pa'i chos kyi rnams grangs 'di bstan pa'i tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// nam zhig 'jig rten khams 'di 'byung ba dang / 'jig rten
186b7(mdo sde): thams cad nam mkha' gyur pa'i tshe// ji ltar sngon bzhin phyis kyang de bzhin te// chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis// 'jig rten 'di na ji snyed kyi/
187a1(mdo sde): yod pa// chu yi phung po 'di ni 'og tu 'gro// 'og tu ci 'drar steng du'ang de bzhin no// chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis/
187a2(mdo sde): ltar bar snang cung chang sprin mad las/ ad cig tu ni sprin gyi dkyil 'khor snang / thog mag las byung bar shes par bya/ de bzhin chos rnams thams cad shes par gyis/
187a3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan 'das pa dag/ ji ltar yid la byas bzhin gzugs brnyan snang / sngon mtha' ji bzhin phyis kyang de bzhin te/ chos rnams thams cad de
187a4(mdo sde): bzhin shes par gyis// ji ltar dbu pa mang po rdol pa dag chu bos khyer ba skyes bus nges mthong ste// de la brtags na snying po yong mi snang // chos rnams thams cad
187a5(mdo sde): bzhin shes par gyis// ji ltar char pa thigs chen bab pa na// chu yi chu bur dag ni tha dad 'byung // byung nas zhig ste chu yi chu bur med/ chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par
187a6(mdo sde): gyis// ji ltar spring yig grong gzhan skur ba las// dge dang mi dge'i bya ba so sor 'byung // sgra las spring yig tu yang 'phos pa med// chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes
187a7(mdo sde): par gyis// ji ltar mi dag chang gis myos nas ni// sa 'di kun tu 'khor snyam byed mod kyi// sa 'di 'gul zhing g.yos pa'ang med pa ltar// chos rnams thams cad de
187b1(mdo sde): bzhin shes par gyis// me long ngos dang 'bru bar sdong rnams la/ bud med bzhin brgyan pas bsdus pa na/ byis pa de ni de la chags bskyed nas/ 'dod pa tshol ba'i phyir yang /
187b2(mdo sde): shin tu drug/ bzhin ni der yang 'phos pa ma yin te// gzugs brnyan la ni nam yang gzhan mi rnyed// rmongs pa de dag 'dod chags sres pa ltar// chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes
187b3(mdo sde): par gyis// ji ltar smig rgyu dri za'i grong khyer dang // sgyu ma ji bzhin rmi lam ji lta bur// mtshan ma sgom pa ngo bo nyid kyis stong // chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis/
187b4(mdo sde): ltar nam mkha' dang bar zla shar ba// de yi gzugs brnyan dang ba'i 'tshor snang ste// zla ba chu yi nang du 'phos pa med// chos kun mtshan nyid de 'drar shes par gyis// ji ltar mi dag
187b5(mdo sde): nags ri'i khrod 'dug nas/ glu len sgra dang dgod dang ngu ba las// brag cha thos kyang snang ba med pa ltar/ chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis// glu dang rol mo de bzhin du
187b6(mdo sde): ba yang // de la brten nas brag cha 'byung mod kyi/ sgra la dbyangs de nam yang yod ma yin// chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis// ji ltar mi lam na yang 'dod bsten pa/
187b7(mdo sde): skyes bu sad par gyur nas mi mthong ste// byis pa shin tu 'dod la chags shing zhe na// chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis// sgyu ma bye ba dag gis gzugs sprul te/
188a1(mdo sde): rta dang glang po shing rta sna tshogs byas// de la ji ltar snang ba gang yang med// chos rnams cad de bzhin shes par gyis// ji ltar bu mo gzhon nu'i rmi lam na/
188a2(mdo sde): bu po byung zhing shi ba des mthong na// byung na dga' zhing shin mi dga' ltar// chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis// ji ltar mtshan mo chu yi zla ba dag/ dang zhing rnyog pa med pa'i chu
188a3(mdo sde): rlung snang // chuR+Ya stong pa gsog ste gzung du med// chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis// ji ltar sos ka'i nyi ma phyed dus na// sras bu sgom pas gdungs shing 'gro ba yis//
188a4(mdo sde): smig rgyu dag la rdumi phung po mthong // chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis// smig rgyu la yang chu ni yongs med na// sems can rmongs pa de la 'thung 'dod de// mi bden chuni
188a5(mdo sde): 'thung bar yong mi nus// chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis// ji ltar chu shing rlon pa'i sdong po la// snying po 'dod phyir skyes bus de gshegs kyang // nang dang phyi rol kun
188a6(mdo sde): na snying po med// chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis// mig dang rna ba sna yang tshad ma min// lce dang lus dang sems kyang tshad ma min// dbang po 'di dag gal te tshad yin na/
188a7(mdo sde): 'phags pa'i lam gyis su la ci zhig bya// 'di ltar dbang po 'di dag tshad min zhing // ngo bo nyid kyis bems po lung ma bstan// de phyir mya ngan 'da' ba'i lam 'dod pa// des ni 'phags
188b1(mdo sde): nga'i lam gyis bya ba byos// lus la sngon gyi mtha' ma rab brtags na// de la lus med lus su 'du shes med/ gang la lus med lus su shes med pa// de ni 'dus ma byas kyi rigs ni bya
188b2(mdo sde): mya ngan 'das pa'i chos la chos med de// gang phyir 'di med nam yang yod mi 'gyur// tog can dag gi yod dang med ces bya// de ltar spyod pa sdug bsngal zhi mi 'gyur// yod dang med ces
188b3(mdo sde): bya ba gnyi ga mtha'// gtsang dang mi gtsang 'di yang mtha' yin te// de phyir gnyi ga'i mtha' ni rnam spangs nas// mkhas pa dbus la'ang gnas par yong mi byed// yod dang med ces bya ba
188b4(mdo sde): brtsod pa ste// gtsang dang mi gtsang 'di yang rtsod pa yin// rtsod par gyur pa sdug bsngal zhi mi 'gyur// rtsod pa med par gyur pa sdug bsngal 'gag/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i gtam byas te/
188b5(mdo sde): byis pa bdag nyid lus la mngon sum snyems// lus la mngon sum gyur pa rlom sems med// de ni rlom sems med do thams cad spangs// bsam gtan bzhi dag gi yang gtam byas nas//
188b6(mdo sde): byis pa bdag nyid bsam gtan spyod yul smra// bsam gtan nyon mongs med cing rlom sems med// shes pas rtogs nas dregs pa rab tu spong // bden pa bzhi yi ga tam
188b7(mdo sde): rnams byas nas kyang // byis pa bdag nyid bden pa mthong zhes zer/ bden pa mthong la rlom sems gang yang med/ rlom sems med pa bden par rgyal bas gsungs/
189a1(mdo sde): tshul khrims bsrung zhing de yis bsnyems mi bya// chos rnams mnyan cing des ni mi bsnyems te// gang gis shes rab chung ngun snyoms pa/ rtsa ba re las ras
189a2(mdo sde): sdug bsngal 'phel/ 'jig rten 'dzin pa thams cad mkhyen pa yis/ dregs pa sdug bsngal rtsa ba yin par bstan// rgyags pas dreg pa sdug bsngal rab tu 'phel/ rlom
189a3(mdo sde): sems med pa sdug bsngal 'gag par 'gyur// ji snyed chos mang yongs su chub byas nas// thos pas rgyags shing tshul khrims mi srung na/ tshul khrims 'chal pas ngan 'gror de
189a4(mdo sde): 'gro la// thos pa mang pos de la skyob mi nus// gal te tshul khrims dregs pas de rgyags shing // mang du thos la brtson par mi byed na// tshul khrims 'bras bu ma lus zad nas
189a5(mdo sde): ni/ phyir yang sdug bsngal rab tu myong bar 'gyur// 'jig rten dag na ting 'dzin sgom byed kyang // de ni bdag tu 'du shes bshig mi byed// de yi nyon mongs phyir yang rab tu ldang /
189a6(mdo sde): lhag spyod kyi ni ting 'dzin 'dir bsgoms bzhin// gal te bdag med chos la rab rtog cing // de dag brtags nas gal te sgom byed na// 'bras bu mya ngan 'das thob rgyu
189a7(mdo sde): de yin// rgyu gzhan de dag zhi bar 'gyur mi srid// mi zhig chom rkun mang pos rab gtses nas// 'tsho bar 'dod pas bros shing 'gror rtsal na// de yi rkang pa 'gro zhing
189b1(mdo sde): drug ma rus/ chom rkun dag gis de bzung bcom pa ltar/ de bzhin tshul khrims nyams pa mongs pa'i mi/ 'dus byas dag las 'bros par 'dod mod kyis tshul khrims
189b2(mdo sde): tsams pas de yang 'bros mi nus// nan 'chi bdag gis shin tu gzhom// ji ltar mi rgod stong phrag mang po dag/ rnam pa du ma'i sgo nas sdig byed pa// de bzhin tshon mongs sgo rnams
189b3(mdo sde): du ma nas// mi rgod bzhin du dge ba'i phyogs rnams 'joms// gang gis phung po bdag med rab btags te// spros shing brgyas kyang zhum par mi 'gyur ba// nyon mongs bdud rtsi
189b4(mdo sde): dbang du de mi 'gro// stong pa shes pa de la 'khrug pa med// 'gro mang phung po stong par ston mod kyi// ji ltar bdag med de dag mi shes te// mi shes de dag gzhan gyis rgal na yang //
189b5(mdo sde): khro ba'i zil gyis non cing tshig rtsub snga// mi dag na zhing lus ni sdug bsngal te/ lo grangs mang por res 'ga' ma thar pa// de ni yun ring nad kyis nyon mongs pas/ nang
189b6(mdo sde): rnams gso ba'i phyir yang sman pa btsal// yang dang yang ni de yis btsal ba dang // sman pa mkhas shing rig pa des rnyed de// des kyang snying rje nye bar gzhag nas ni// sman
189b7(mdo sde): 'di btang bar gyis shes byin pa dang // sman mang bzang zhing phangs pa des blangs nas/ nab 'tsho bar 'gyur ba'i sman mi 'thung // sman pas ma lan sman gyis mnyes te/
190a1(mdo sde): nad pa de nyid kyis ni nyes pa yin// de bzhin bstan pa 'di la rab byung ste/ stobs dang bsam gtan dbang po kun rig nas/ bsgom pa la ni mngon par
190a2(mdo sde): brtson mi byed// rig par mi brtson gal mya ngan 'da'// rtag tu chos kun rang bzhin stong pa ste// rgyal ba'i sras rnams dngos po rnam par 'jig/ srid pa thams cad yod ye
190a3(mdo sde): stong pa ste/ ci tshe'i stong pa mu stegs can dag gis/ mkhas pa byis pa dag dang rtsod mi byed/ byis pa dag ni ri mor byas nas spong / zhe sdang sems kyis bdag gi drung 'ong /
190a4(mdo sde): zhes// bris pa'i chos la rten par yong mi byed/ byis pa dag gi rang bzhin cud rig nas/ mkhas pa bris pa dag dang mi 'grogs te/ ji srid du ni byis pa legs bsnyen
190a5(mdo sde): kyang // de dag phyir yang dgra dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ mkhas pa byis pa dag la yid mi rton// mkhas dang byis pa'i rang bzhin chos nyid ni/ byis pa'i rang bzhin rang tshul tha dang /
190a6(mdo sde): so so'i skye bo la ni mdza' ba med// chos dang ldan pa'i tshig tu smras na yang // yid mi ches dang zhe sdang khro ba dang // mngon par ston pa 'din bris pa'i chos// don 'di rnam
190a7(mdo sde): par rig pas yid ma thon/ byis pa dang ni byis par mthun 'byor pa/ ji mar mi gtsang ba dang mi gtsang bzhin// mkhas pa dag ni mkhas pa'i sgo bo dang / mthun ning 'byor
190b1(mdo sde): pa mar dang snying ku bzhin// 'khor ba'i nyes la so sor ma brtags te// las kyi rnam par smin la mi 'jug cing / sangs rgyas rnams kyi tshig la ma dad pas/ byis pa de dag bcad/
190b2(mdo sde): cing btub par 'gyur// mi mthong rab tu rnyed dka' thob nas ni// bzo yi gnas dag la ni mkhas ma gyur// dbul por gyur cing nor yang yong med de// de nas 'tsho ba med pas rab
190b3(mdo sde): tu byung // sangs rgyas bstan 'dir de dag rab byung nas// lhung bzed chos gos dag la chags par 'gyur// de dag sdig pa'i grogs pos yongs zin pas// bde bar gshegs pa'i
190b4(mdo sde): bslab pa mi spyod de// de dag bdag gi tshul khrims ma mthong bas// byis pa dag ni sems gnas mi rnyed cing // nyin mtshan rnal 'byor la yang mi brtson pas// de dag sdig
190b5(mdo sde): pa'i lam la smod mi byed// lus dang sems ni shin tu mi sdom pa// de ni tshig tu mi smra ci yang med// su yis nyes pa ci byas brgal lo zhes// rtag tu gzhan gyis nyes pa tshol zhing
190b6(mdo sde): rtog/ byis pa dag ni zas la chags gyur nas// zas la tshod rig par ni mi byed de// sangs rgyas bsod nams kyis ni zas rnyed kyang // de la byis pa byas pa gzo mi 'gyur// de dag
190b7(mdo sde): kha zas ro zhim gsod pa dag/ rnyed nas rnal 'byor mi brtson za zhing 'thung // de dag la ni zas de gdug par 'gyur// ba glang phrug gus rtsa ba ma dkrugs bzhin// mkhas shing rtogs
191a1(mdo sde): pa blo gros ldan pa ni/ kha zas bzang po gtsang ma za mod kyi// de dag la ni chags par mi 'gyur te/ ma chags bzhin du za zhing rnal 'byor brtson// mkhas/
191a2(mdo sde): shing rtogs pa blo gros ldan pa dag/ byis pa gang nas legs par 'ongs shes smras// de bzhin snyan pa'i tshig gis nyer bsdus nas// de dag la ni snying rje che par 'jog byis pa la ni gang
191a3(mdo sde): phan snying brtse ba// de la gnod pa byung na byis pa dga'// de lha'i nyes phyir byis pa rnams spangs te// ri dgas bzhin du gcig pu dgon par gnas// mkhas pas 'di 'dra'i nyes pa
191a4(mdo sde): rig nas ni// shes rab dman bsten bdag ni mtho ris nyams// byang chub thob par ga la 'gyur snyam ste// byis pa rnams dang nam yang yong mi sten// byams pa la ni mkhas pa gnas par 'gyur//
191a5(mdo sde): snying rje dag la gnas shing dga' bar spyod// srid pa kun la rtag tu btang snyoms pa// ting nge 'dzin bsgoms byang chub reg par 'gyur// mya ngan med zhing byang chub des rtogs shing // sems can
191a6(mdo sde): nargas gzir bar rig nas ni// de la snying rje rab tu nyer gzhag ste// don dam ldan pa'i gtam rnams ston par byed/ rgyal ba'i chos nyid brjod du med pa dang / bde bar gshegs pa'i bden
191a7(mdo sde): pa sus shes pa// de dag 'di lta bu yi chos thos nas// 'phags pa zang zing med pa'i bzod pa thob// chos zab mo la bzod pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// de
191b1(mdo sde): nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu de lta bas na/ nan tan snying por bya'o zhes gzhon nu khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// de ci'i phyir
191b2(mdo sde): zhe na/ gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nan tan snying por byed pa la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang rnyed par dka' ba ma yin na// ting nge 'dzin 'dis
191b3(mdo sde): ci smos// de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa cig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la bcugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de
191b4(mdo sde): logs su thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
191b5(mdo sde): rnams la gdams pa dang / rjes su bstan pa 'di legs par bstan cing legs par bkod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa thams cad bstan te/ legs par bshad pa
191b6(mdo sde): dang legs par bkod pa bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sa'ang
191b7(mdo sde): ma lags na/ mu stegs can gzhan gyi lta ci smos/ bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang nan tan snying por bgyis te/ lus dang srog la yang mi lta bar bgyis la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
192a1(mdo sde): rjes su slob pa/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su bslab par 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bla na med
192a2(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bdud sdig can shin tu gzhig par 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni/
192a3(mdo sde): sems can thams cad 'jigs pa thams cad dang / sdug bsngal thams cad las bsgral bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag g.yas pa bdag gi spyi bo la bzhag par gsol/
192a4(mdo sde): de la 'di skad ces byaste/ nam mkha' 'dra zhing rdul bral gzugs bzang 'chang // shes rab sras po lus dang mtshan mi mnga'// yon tan rgya mtsho rab za thugs rje can/ mtshungs med
192a5(mdo sde): phyag ni bdag gi spyi bor zhog/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag g.yas pa dge ba'i rtsa ba du ma las byung ba/ mtshan sna tshogs kyis shin tu brgyan pa lha'i
192a6(mdo sde): gser gyi kha dog lta bu zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa'i spyi bor bzhag go// bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gnon nur gyur pa'i spyi bor phyag g.yas pa bzhag ma thag tude skad cig de nyid la rba
192a7(mdo sde): 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la dpa' bar 'gro ba dang / nam mkha' mdzod dang / rdo rje lta bu dang / yid kyi mgyogs pa dang / gzugs thams cad ston pa dang / sgrib pa med pa'i mtha'
192b1(mdo sde): dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ston pa dang / stong pa nyid thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba thob pa la sogs pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa las byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo
192b2(mdo sde): drag khrig brgya stong du ma brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag mngon du gyur te/ gzungs dang rnam par thar pa'i sgo rum mngon du gyur to// dga' ba dang bde bar gang de 'phags pas
192b3(mdo sde): brjod pa lha yul ba rgya che zhing dpe med pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod yul rig pa rab tu thob bo// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dra bas
192b4(mdo sde): mdzes 'brel bum pa lcags kyu'i mtshan mnga' zhing / dpal be'u 'khor lo rgyal mtshan pa ngamanya ris mnga'/ bskal pa bye mang rin chen gtong la zhugs pa'i phyag bcom ldan
192b5(mdo sde): 'das kyis bla 'od gzhon nur spyi bor bzhag/ de nas lha yul ba rgya che zhing dpe med pa sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod yul du rig pa'i dga' ba rang
192b6(mdo sde): bde ba dang ldan par gyur nas/ stan las langs te tha gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar
192b7(mdo sde): ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang mthun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod do// bla med mi 'jigs sbyin pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// gzhan phan sems
193a1(mdo sde): can gnyen rtsa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// stobs bcu bden pa'i rtsal mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bder gshegs mi mnyam mnyam pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//
193a2(mdo sde): mgon po shin tu thugs rje can la phyag 'tshal lo// dpa' bo dgra bzhi rnam par btul la phyag 'tshal lo// btsun pa dam pa'i don rnams mkhyen la phyag 'tshal lo// chos kyi sku
193a3(mdo sde): mchog mnga' ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo// snying rje byams 'od rgyal 'od nyi ma mun sel ba// shes rab shin tu yang pa'i nam mkha'i dkyil du shar// don dam shin tu zab pa'i chos
193a4(mdo sde): rnams ston mdzad pa// lha khyod la ni rtag tu bdag kyang skyabs su 'chi// de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'ad sa la tshul dang 'dra ba'i
193a5(mdo sde): tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ byang chub sems
193a6(mdo sde): dpa'i dge 'dun dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa sangs bdag gi sdum par bshos gsol bar thugs la gnang bar mdzad du gsol// de la 'di skad ces bya
193a7(mdo sde): ste/ bdag gi sdum par gtsang ba'i bshos gsol bar mi dbang sras dang bcas la gsol ba 'debs/ thub pa'i dbang po bdag la thugs brtse'i phyir/ mgon po lha
193b1(mdo sde): sa gan bar mang/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / can thos kyis dge 'dun dang /
193b2(mdo sde): thangs cig tu zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa'i khyim du ngas pashos gsol bar cang mi gsung bar gyur pas gnang ngo // de nas bu 'ong gzhon nur gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das cang kyi
193b3(mdo sde): gsung bar byur bas gnang bar gnas sman las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu babar nasabacom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom
193b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas song ngo // den zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas bya rgod kyi phung po'i rims babs nas de'i tshe rgyal
193b5(mdo sde): po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po'i bar du de'i bar gyis lam thams cad legs par brgyan te/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i
193b6(mdo sde): phyir/ lam yangs shing che la/ rtsa dang / sdong dum dang / tsher ma dang / rdo dang / gyo mo dang / gseg ma med par gsal te/ b+he ma gtsang mas 'dal nas
193b7(mdo sde): ka tsa li nI ka ltar 'jam zhing reg na bde ba/ dbyangs dga' bar byas te/ lha'i me tog ut+pal dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / dri mchog dang / a ti mug ta dang
194a1(mdo sde): ma la li ka dang / tsam pa ka dang / sra sAr dang / kun dadang ti la ka dang she sar dang / mya ngan 'tshang la sogs pa/ dus thams cad kyi me tog bzang /
194a2(mdo sde): po'i ni kun tu khebs par byas/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang rnam par rgyal ba'i ba dan dang / rin po che'i rta babs dang / bla re ni bres rin po che'i bdug spos kyi
194a3(mdo sde): snod sna tshogs ni ngos la sbyangs/ rin po che'i bdug spos kyi snod de dag thams cad nas ni a ka ru nag pos gang ba'i dub 'phrul/ phyogs phyogs su ni bro mkhan dang / gar mkhan lha'i
194a4(mdo sde): glu gar dang / rol mo shin tu 'byor cing legs par bsrabs pa rnams bkod skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo shin tu brgyan pa dang / khar rnga dang / pi wang rgyud
194a5(mdo sde): gcig pa dang / pi wang dang / gling bu dang / rdza rnga dang / rnga mu kun da dang / dze rnga chen po thogs pa rnams bkod/ lam gyi ngos gnyis su shing ta la mthon po lha'i rin po che sna
194a6(mdo sde): tshogs dang / 'dzam bu'i rgya bo gser las byas pa'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba bres shing sgra 'khrol bas brgyan pa rnams dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi mkha' rten bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dum
194a7(mdo sde): dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi shing sna tshogs khrun dang sdoms su ldan pa sna tshogs dus thams cad kyi lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa dag btsugs so// de la
194b1(mdo sde): nas cas/ man chags shin tu lags par bcan dang ni gdugs dang ba dan 'anang ma sbyin ngag kyi sa gar tu / rdzuthA med du 'ong ba'ang
194b2(mdo sde): ni/ drang med mang bziju shAr byed dang / gos parang zag khrig rnam sang snatshegs dang / me tog 'phreng ba 'dra zhing mdzes pa yis mams chag mas pa da pa
194b3(mdo sde): tshang mags ca ma 'dzin thugs rje can// sangs rgyas thub pa'i bla 'odag shegs sonas// rdza nga man sa rang pa rab bskyengs/ ma mangs pa'i man
194b4(mdo sde): brgyan// lha rdzas kyi ni bye ma gtsang ma bdal// rab tu yid 'ong me tog mchog rnams bkram// rin chen rta babs dag kyang legs par btsugs// lam ni lha yi grong khyer bzhin du mdzes
194b5(mdo sde): zla 'od gnon nu shin tu yang dga' bas// de ltar lam rnams sna tshogs legs brgyan te/ lnga dang m+b+ha mimaklu yis de mthong nas// ngo mtshar gyur cing a ma la zhes sla/ lam gyi
194b6(mdo sde): gams gsos 'dzam bu'i chu gser gyi/ ta la mtho zhing bzang la zlum pa dag rin chen dril bu'i drabs g.yogs shing dkrigs/ A 'grol rnam pa dum mang po btsugs/
194b7(mdo sde): de bzhin rin chen sdong po khrag khrig ni// dus kun gyi yang me tog rgyas pa btsugs// de yi yangs pa'i lam brgyan mdzes gyur pa// mtho ris na ni dga' ba'i tshal bu bzhin// rin po
195a1(mdo sde): ches las byas pa'i mkha' rten ni// dra ba'i rgyan po 'od 'bar shin tu mdzes// dpe med mtho zhing che la rgyas pa dag/ lam gyi g.yas g.yos 'gram du btsus/
195a2(mdo sde): shing bkod// sangs rgyas 'jig rten gsum dbang gang nas ni// rgyal po'i khab kyi grong du gshegs pa yi// lam chen de ni de dag rab rgyas pas// rnam pa thams cad du'ang mdzes par gyur//
195a3(mdo sde): g.yas g.yon du ni rin chen pog por sbyangs// de dag a ga ru yang nag pos bkang // pog por kun nas dub sprin bzhin 'khrigs// lha yi dri zhim rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung // ji srid zong /
195a4(mdo sde): khyer chu dron sgo bar dang // ri rgyal bya rgod phung po ji srid bar// zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas rgyal ba'i phyir// lha rdzas dpe med yangs pa brgyan par byas// de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur//
195a5(mdo sde): pas lam de rin po che bkod pa rnam pa sna tshogs du mas brgyan pa byas nas// zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri las babs te/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po gang na ba
195a6(mdo sde): dang rang gi lha'i khyim mtho zhing che la yangs pa gang na yod pa der song ste phyin nas/ rang gi khyim du zhugs so// zhugs nas bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / myang ba mang zhing bzang ba g.yor bcug
195a7(mdo sde): ste zhal zas ro sna brgya pa sbyar nas/ de'i mtshan mo 'das pa dang / rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po chag chag legs par btab/ byi dor legs par byas nas/ me tog sil ma ni bkra/
195b1(mdo sde): bdun thos kyis ni gdugs/ tha res ni gyis/ dang kyai lnga ldi dang rgyan pa ni spangs/ gdugs dang / rgyam mdun dang / bdan ni bsgreng ste/ de ltar rgyal ba'i lab kyi grong khyer chen pon/
195b2(mdo sde): lam srang dang / grong bar du bcas pa rdo dang / tso mo dang / gseg mo med par byas/ me tog sna tshogs ni ba 'am/ tsan ngan gyi byams ni gtor/ sar lung dang / Na babs dang /
195b3(mdo sde): rno gang dang / ba gam dang / ska drung drab ris dang / zla ba khams pa lta bus ni brgyan cing / tsan dan gyis byug pa byas te/ de ltar rgyal po'i khab kyi zong khyer chen po dpag tu med pa'i
195b4(mdo sde): bkod pas rab tu brdzun nas/ rang gi khyim yang rgyan sna tshogs rnam pa rnams brtan te/ rin po rje'i 'phreng ba rnam padus ni ra tu ltung / dga' ldan ste ris kyi sna'i gos kyis ni brdzun
195b5(mdo sde): cing nyen 'khor yang mdzes par byas/ phreng ba dang lnga ldi rnam pa tha dad pa du mas ni brgyan pa byed du bcug/ rin po che'i stan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma ni 'ding du bcug ste/ bcom
195b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ de'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das kyi lha rdzas kyi seng ge'i khri lha'i dang mi'i las 'das pa bshams so// rin po che sna tshogs kyi pog por ni phyogs
195b7(mdo sde): bzhir sbyangs te/ de dag nas a ka ru 'ba' shig gis du ba 'thul bar byas so// zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas khyim mchog de yang 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yongs su longs
196a1(mdo sde): spyad pa'i phyir/ lha'i glu gar dang / sil snyan ni bsgrags/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan ni bsgreng / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za/
196a2(mdo sde): dang lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa brgya stong gis ni gang zhing rnam par bltas// rin po che'i me tog sna tshogs rnam
196a3(mdo sde): pa du mas ni gang bar byas so// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ zla 'od kyis ni khyim mchog yangs pa yang // rgya cher thams cad shin tu brgyan par byas// gang la 'jig rten sgron ma bzhug pa yi//
196a4(mdo sde): lha rdzas seng ge'i khri ni dbus su btsugs// 'jig rten sgron mdzad rgyal ba'i gtso bo yi// dge 'dun dag ni gang la 'dug 'gyur pa// rin chen shin tu rnam par bkra ba'i stan// bye ba stong phrag
196a5(mdo sde): mtha' yas legs par bting // rin chen sna tshogs kun gyi bdug spos snod// a ga ru yis shin tu gang byas te// phyogs rnams thams cad du yang rnam par sbyangs// de dag nas ni yid 'ong dri
196a6(mdo sde): rnams 'thul// zla 'od kyis ni stobs bcu gshegs pa'i phyir// rin chen me tog mdzes pa sna tshogs dang // me tog dri mchog bzang po rnam mang gis// khyim gyi sa gzhi bzang po kun tu bkras
196a7(mdo sde): gar byed glu lan sil snyan sgra dag gis// khyim mchog thams cad kun tu sgra yis gang // gdugs dang ba dan dag kyang shin tu bsgreng // khyim kun lam mer mdzes pa lha yi bzhin// zla 'od
196b1(mdo sde): gzhon nu'i khyim mchog rten po yang // skyes bun chung tshogs kyis rgyas gyur cing // klu dang gnod sbyin lha min mang pos gang // brgya phrag mang po'i lha yis rnam par bltas// de nas nu 'od gnon/
196b2(mdo sde): rung gyur bas// rgyal po la bab kyi grong khyer chen po yang bcan/ bdag gi khyim yang legs par brgyan nas/ de'i mtshan mo 'das pa dang / nang par snga rab kyi dus kyi tshe/ sil snyan sna tshogs brgya
196b3(mdo sde): dag ni rab tu dkrol/ gdugs dang / rdul mtshan dang / ba dan bye ba du ma ni bsgreng ste/ byang chub sems bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu thams cad kyang / lha'i me tog marda ras snyim pa
196b4(mdo sde): bkang ste/ de dag la la ni skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di lta ste/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / mthu chen thob dang / spos kyi glang po
196b5(mdo sde): dang / rin po che'i tog dang / mngon par 'byung dka' dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / dpa' bo'i sI dang / lags bzang dang / rin chen me tog dang / mthong ba don yod pa
196b6(mdo sde): dang byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen pos yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ rta dang ba lang dum shin tu brgyan cing / mazhon par khrid pa mang po dang 'dres pas
196b7(mdo sde): gzhan yang yul gyi mi dpag tu med pa'i tshogs dang / bdag nyid kyang lha'i me tog man+da ras snyim pa bkang ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul
197a1(mdo sde): chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i cho 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i a la la zhes lha'i gzha'i sgra yid du 'thar cing yid du 'ong ba yid 'phrog pa/
197a2(mdo sde): dag sgrog cing rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i chu dron gyi sgo nas phyir byung ste/ ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom
197a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ lha'i me tog man+da ras snyim pa gang bas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor
197a4(mdo sde): te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das/
197a5(mdo sde): la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ so so'i snyim pa na me tog man+da ra yod pas des/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa phyogs
197a6(mdo sde): gcig tu 'dug pa stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud
197a7(mdo sde): nas gdugs tshod phab pa/ bcom ldan 'das bshos gtsang sbyar lags te/ da de'i dus la bab par bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen na/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / dge
197b1(mdo sde): srong gi dge 'dun du bcas pa dang dbang rje dbang che bar grags pa gcu che zhing rlabs che ba'i sgra dang / mu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri ba dang / lA ma yin dang nang srong dang
197b2(mdo sde): rnam mapar lding dang mi 'am ci dang / sgo 'phye chen po dang / rdul bum dang / yi rags dang / srul po dang / mi dang mo ma yin pa dag dang yang thabs gcig tu rgyab po'i khab kyi byong
197b3(mdo sde): khyer chen por gshegs shing bdag gi sdum par yang gdugs tshod gsol ba'i dus la bab bo// bde bar gshegs pa gdugs tshong la bab po/ de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ bdag gi zong
197b4(mdo sde): khyer mchog kun legs par brgyan/ mgon po bdag gi sdum pa'ang de bzhin te/ lha yi zhal zas ro brgya bshams shing sbyar// gdugs tshod bab kyis bde gshegs bzhengs su
197b5(mdo sde): gsol// drang srong mchog gis phyag bgyis stobs bcu yon tan 'chang // sras kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing grong du gshegs// sdang byed nyi ma mun pa'i tshogs sel ba zhengs su gsol/
197b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan bdag gi sdum par bshes gsol gdugs tshong bag/ sras dang thabs cig bdag gi sdum par gshegs su gsol// 'gro ba mang po'i tshogs kyi don kyang bgyis par 'gyur// ji ltar/
197b7(mdo sde): mar me mdzad kyis khyod la lung bstan pa/ de bzhin bdag kyang 'jig rten mngon sum lung ston cig/ bdag 'dir lung bstan 'jig rten thos nas ni// sems can mchog tu rgya che bar bskyed
198a1(mdo sde): de du 'gro ba 'di dag thams cad sangs rgyas 'gyur// 'di na snod min sems can gang yang med// bzhengs shig bzhengs shig stobs bcu mnga' ba'i lha/
198a2(mdo sde): bdag la rjes su phan mdzod sdum par gshegs// ji ltar bdag gi sdum par khyod gshegs pa// de bzhin byang chub shing dbang drung bdag 'chi/ byang chub shing dbang de drung bdag mchis nas/
198a3(mdo sde): mi g.yo mi 'gul bar ni gnas bcas te// byams pas sder bcas bdud rnams pham bgyis nas// khyod kyis brnyes bzhin byang chub thob par bgyi// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ga zla 'od
198a4(mdo sde): gzhon nur gyur pas gsol ba mkhyen nas// zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la tshigs su bcad pas slar bka' stsal pa/ longs shig zla 'od rgyal ba'i sras// longs shig sbyin dga' sems
198a5(mdo sde): can mchog/ longs shig snying rje tshul khrims brtan// zan la de ni khyim du 'dong // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs nas/ sngar gdan
198a6(mdo sde): las bzhengs te/ sham thabs gsol/ chos gos dang / lhung zer bsnams nas/ dge slong 'bum du tshang ba'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu byang chub sems dpa'/
198a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po shin tu mang pos bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / drang srong dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang /
198b1(mdo sde): nga bu chen po dang / bral bum dang / yi dgas dang / phul ba dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa brgya spong mas mchong cing mngon par bstod nas sa sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po dang / sangs rgyas/
198b2(mdo sde): rdzung phrum rten po dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'brul chen po dang / sangs rgyas hU~M spyod lam gyis/ 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig 'argya srung ni rab tu gtong/ sil snyan theb khrag khrig brgya stong
198b3(mdo sde): ni rab tu dkrol gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma ni mngon par bsgrengagazugs dpa'i dog rags pa dum rnam pa sna tshogs kyi dang ba nga
198b4(mdo sde): khrung zung dang / ngur pa dang / gzhang dang / tsa gor dang / rma bya dang / tsa sha dang / ri skegs dang / khu byug dang / kA la bing+ga dang / kun la la sogs pa bya'i khyu mang po sgra snyan cing 'jam la
198b5(mdo sde): yid du 'ong ba rnam pa du ma 'byin pas ni bar snang la lha bzhin du so so'i nga ros rol mo'i sgra dbyangs 'byin/ lho'i rin po che sna tshogs kyi bdug spos kyi snod yangs shing che ba bye ba khrag khrig
198b6(mdo sde): brgya stong dum thams cad kyang bcur dang / in+d+ra mipa dang / shes dang / sdug ste yub cam ngag mnod sbyin gyi dbang po gzugs babang dang / dbang bar byos dang / rang
198b7(mdo sde): dang bkul dang / lnga rtsen dang / shAkya 'phel la sogs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dag gi lag pa gnyis na gtun 'dzin pa bzhin du thogs te/ spos sbrul gyi snying po dang kor
199a1(mdo sde): shir sha dang / rmi na la dang / ha ri dang / ma la ya dang / tsan dan dmar po dang / a ga ru la sogs pas bkang ba'i du ba ni 'brul/ phyogs so so nas lpags
199a2(mdo sde): pa'i rgyal po dbang che ba/ dbang che bar grags pa rnams rta dang ba lang rgyan gyis shin tu brgyan cing ma zhon par khrid pa'i tshogs du ma dang / shing rta dang / dpung bu chung gis yongs su bskor
199a3(mdo sde): cing / 'phreng ba dang lda ldi mang po dang / rin po che'i 'phreng ba lag na thogs shing sngon logs na rkang gis 'gro'o// rta dang glang po che legs par brgyan pa ma zhon pa khrid pa dag kyang / rang gi
199a4(mdo sde): stobs kyis mngon par 'gro zhing skad yid du 'ong la snyan pa 'byin to// tshangs pa yang bcom ldan 'das kyis g.yas phyogs nas mchod pa dang / rim gro bsnyen bkur byed cing 'gro'o//
199a5(mdo sde): g.yon phyogs nas ni lha'i dbang po brgya byin lha'i bu dbang che ba/ dbang che bar grags pa/ rgya che zhing rlabs che ba/ bgrang ba las 'das pa rnams lha'i cod pan bzang po dang / gdu bu brgyan
199a6(mdo sde): can dang / rna cha dang / ga du bu dang / me tog rna rgyan dang / rin po che'i tsong tsong dang / me tog gi 'phreng bas lus brgyan cing gzugs mngon par snang bas/ lha'i me tog man+da ra wa dang
199a7(mdo sde): mdog mdzes dang / ko bi da ra dang / s+tha la ka dang / kur pa ka dang / tsam pa ka dang / dong ka'i me tog dang / mya ngan 'tshang dang / skya snar dang / a ti mug ta dang / ut+pa la
199b1(mdo sde): pa sum da / mal mi ka dang / kun dang gis dang / pad+ma dang / kra m+ba dang / pazla kar po dang / rje mchog dang / rim po che'i 'phreng ba dang / rinam /
199b2(mdo sde): rlu dang / shing rin po che'i 'bras bu tsun dag lag na thogs shing sil snyan sna tshogs brgyacu stong ni shin tu dkrol/ gos bye ba ni g.yob cing a la la zhes gzha'i sla dag ni 'byin me
199b3(mdo sde): tog gi char chen po ni rab tu 'bebs shing / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ nam mkha'i ngos thams cad bar mtshams med par gang bar 'khod de/ me tog dang
199b4(mdo sde): spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / rin po che'i char rab tu 'bebs shing / bcom ldan 'das chu dron yod pa'i sgo nas/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por
199b5(mdo sde): gdugs tshod la gshegs so// de'i chos nyid 'di yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o// sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs pas dus mkhyen nas/ dpa' bo yon tan kun gyis
199b6(mdo sde): rab brgyan pa// zhing rnams bsam gyis mi khyab snang mdzad cing / bcom ldan mi yi seng ge gshegs par gyur// spyan ras gzigs dang mthu chen don yod dang / spos kyi
199b7(mdo sde): ba glang rin chen lag bzangs dang / rin chen tog dang 'byung dka' dpa' bo dang / de dang gzhan dag rgyal ba'i zham ring byed/ g.yas phyogs na ni mi 'pham 'dug gyur te// de ming
200a1(mdo sde): byams pa yon tan mtha' yas phyag/ bar du mchod sangs rgyas 'gyur ba ste/ bsod nams ye shes tshogs kyang rab tu rdzogs/ byams dang btang
200a2(mdo sde): snyoms dga' bas lus bsgoms zhing / chos kyi bdag nyid chen po snying rje bskyed// yon tan mtha' yas thub dbang yon tan sems// bde gshegs thugs rje can gyi zham ring byed/
200a3(mdo sde): de yi rjes la bskal pa bzang po yis/ blo gros chen po ldan pa ji snyed pa'i// sangs rgyas stong du bzhis ma tshang ba dag/ de dag gis kyang byams pa mdun du bdar// gang sngon rgyal po'i
200a4(mdo sde): khab kyi grong khyer 'dir// bskal pa dag la rgyal ba mtha' yas mchod// zla ba mdzes pa'i 'od 'dra lha yi lus// zla 'od dpa' bo yang ni mdun na 'dug/ snying rje mchog gi g.yon phyogs
200a5(mdo sde): 'dug pa ni// 'jam dpal bye ba brgya phrag mang po dang / dpa' bo rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis mngon 'phags pa/ brgya phrag mtha' yas zhing du 'gro ba'o// de yi 'og tu nyan thos dge
200a6(mdo sde): 'dun te/ shA ri'i bu 'og mo'u 'gal nag po dang / 'od srungs rab 'byor dga' bo ka pi na// bzang ldan rgyal po de bzhin ko'u di na// kun dga' de bzhin gnas brtan sgra gcan zin//
200a7(mdo sde): legs 'ongs gron ci gang po 'char ba po// nam gru gsus chen nyer 'khor ma 'gags pa// ral pa can ni stong du tshang ba dag/ nyan thos dge 'dun 'og tu thams cad kyang // dka' thub drag/
200b1(mdo sde): mchog rig byed cog shes// dmod pa 'dor dang pan 'dogs rus pa yi/ drang srong dul ba thab sbyar 'dug par byed// ni ba'i yid dang dul ba'i yid rnams kyis// sangs rgyas 'jig rten smon/
200b2(mdo sde): ma mdun dang te// thugs rjer ldan pa'i mi mi seng ge gshegs// sems can stong rnams rab tu thar par mdzad/ skyon zla tha chungs zla bcu bltar// sar tshogs dbang po yongs su dgapa
200b3(mdo sde): bzhin// tshangs pa stong phrag dag ni brgya mang gis// mtshungs pa med pa'i ston pa yongs su bskor// grong khyer gyis ni sgo stong zhabs bzhag tshe// nags tshal stug por bcas pa'i sa yang /

200b5(mdo sde): rtsa ba dpag tu med pa bsags pa/ sgo'i them pa la bzhag ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/
200b6(mdo sde): 'phral rab tu 'dul/ bran turab tu 'phrul/ ldag rab // kun tu rab tu// 'azugs rab tu khrugs/ kun tu rab tu 'khrugs/ ma / ma
200b7(mdo sde): rab tu chem chem/ 'ur 'ur/ rab tu'ur 'urakun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur/ shar phyogs dma' na nub phyogs mtho// nub phyogs dma' na shar phyogs mtho// byang phyogs dma' na lho phyogs
201a1(mdo sde): ma byags ma la kyang thugs saso/ mam ma 'am bus mtho dbus dam mamatha' thar gyugs/ 'angs rten du byung chen pa gyur
201a2(mdo sde): ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung ba'i cho 'phrul grangs med/ dpag tu med pa gzhan dag kyang snang ngo // / 'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mdo/ @ma/
201a3(mdo sde): po bzhi pa/ de'i chos nyid ni 'di yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o// grong khyer mchog der 'dren pa gshegs pa na// sgo them la ni zhabs mchog bzhag pa'i tshe// de yi dpal
201a4(mdo sde): gyis sa 'di rab tu g.yos// grong khyer mchog 'di'i sems can rab tu dga'// mi dag bkres shing skom par gyur pa dag/ de tshe de dag bkres pa med par 'gyur// rgyal bas sgo yi them steng
201a5(mdo sde): zhabs bzhag tshe// bkres shing skom pa dag kyang bral bar gyur// rgyal bas sgo yi them steng zhabs bzhag mo// dmus long gyur pa'i mi gang ji yod dang // rna ba mi thos mgod med bsod nams
201a6(mdo sde): chung de dag thams cad mig dang rna ba thob// rgyal bas sgo yi them steng zhabs bzhag tshe// gshin rje'i yul gyi yi dgras gang yod pa// shin tu sdug bsngal ngar snabs mchil ma za// thams
201a7(mdo sde): cad 'od kyis reg pas bde bar gyur// rgyal bas sgo yi them steng zhabs bzhag tshe// brag gi rtse dang ri yi rtse mo dang // shing mchog sa la dang ni dong ka rnams// thams cad sangs rgyas bzhugs
201b1(mdo sde): ba'i phyogs su 'dung / rgyal pas sgro mi them ste zhabs bzhag tshe// rgya mtsho mthar thub thong dang grong khyer rnams/ sa kun rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos/ 'dir ni gang la'ang gnod par
201b2(mdo sde): gyur pa med// lha dang mi dang grul bus srin po dang // skyes bu gnas pa dga' mgu sems rangs te/ byang chub ram pa mchog la dang sred nas// 'jig rten rnam par 'dzin pa'i gdugs kyang 'dzin//
201b3(mdo sde): rgyal ba'i sgo yi them steng zhabs bzhag tshe// sil snyan stong dag ma brdungs spa 'byin te// shin tu yid 'ong rol mo'i dbyangs thos pas// de tshe sems can thams cad rab tu dga'// sdong po
201b4(mdo sde): stong phrag brgya dag 'dud par 'gyur// de tshe me tog kun kyang rab tu rgyas// bar snang las ni lha rnams brgya stong dag/ rgyal ba la yang mi min mchog pa byed// rgyal bas sgo yi them steng
201b5(mdo sde): zhabs bzhag tshe// glang po brgya dag sems dga' sgra 'byin te// rtswa dang ba lang rgyal po lus kyang bstod// ri dgas rgyal po seng ge sgra 'byin byed// sa dbang rgyal po gang su ji snyed cig/ phyogs
201b6(mdo sde): dang phyogs mtshams dag nas lhags pa rnams// rgyal ba'i dpal gzi de 'dra mthong nas ni// rab tu sems dga' sa la 'dug cing 'dud// kha cig 'jig rten mgon la mngon par bstod/
201b7(mdo sde): kha cig rgyal la me tog char 'bebs shing // kha cig sor bcu thal mo sbyar nas su// e ma rgyal ba thugs rje can zhes smra/ kha cig mu tig do shal bzang po dang / sna tshogs brgyan mang dag
202a1(mdo sde): sred 'thor bar byed/ byang chub sems mchog ba med bsgred nas su/ kha cig na bapa' rin chen 'thor bar byed/ kha cig gser gyi dra ba bzang po 'thor/ kha cig
202a2(mdo sde): spen tog rgyan bzang 'thor bar byed/ khal gser gyi rgyun ni dam pa 'thor/ khacig de bzhin gdu bu 'thor bar byed// la la gdu bu bzang po de 'thor te/ kha cig rin chen smras pa'i dpung
202a3(mdo sde): rgyan 'thor/ kha cig bdag cag sangs rgyas gyur cig ces// sems bskye dgos phran bzang po 'thor bar byed// 'jig rten mgon po sgo na bzhugs pa'i tshe// mi dag kha cig gser gyi tsong cod/
202a4(mdo sde): 'thor// sems dang gtsug gi nor bu mchog kyang 'thor// la la rin chen dra ba 'thor bar byed// sems can shin tu mi bzad sdug bsngal zhing // gtse ba rnam mang zug rngus zug pa yang /
202a5(mdo sde): 'dren pa skyes bu gtso bo dpal gyis ni// thams cad bde dang yang ldan par gyur// khu byug dang ni ri skegs ma bya dang // de bzhin khrung khrung dang ni mtsho bya dang // bya mang kun ni nam mkha' 'dug
202a6(mdo sde): nas su// shin tu yid 'ong mchog gi sgra yang 'byin// de tshe bya tshogs mang po rab dga' bas// 'jam zhing yid du 'ong ba'i sgra byung ste// gang gis snyan pa'i sgra skad de zos pa// de dag
202a7(mdo sde): 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug zhi// sems can bye bas dga' ba'i sgra thos nas// thams cad rjes su mthun pa'i bzod thob ste// ma 'ongs dus na rgyal bar khyed 'gyur zhes// de dag kun la
202b1(mdo sde): bder gshegs lung yang ston// de yi dus na nyon mongs mi 'byung ste// chos kyi rgyal la thams cad ri mor bcas// de tshe 'dzin pa'i sku byad mthong nas ni// sangs rgyas ye shes mchog la
202b2(mdo sde): mos bskyed de// bdag cag nam zhig 'di 'dra'i mkhyen thob snyam// bsam pa mkhyen nas rgyal ba lung ston te// bde bar gshegs pa'i ba spu'i khung re nas/ 'od zer dag ni stong phrag brgya
202b3(mdo sde): yang byung // de las lhags par gang+gA'i bye snyed de// de dag gi yang mtshan ma gzung mi nus// de tshe nyi ma'i 'od kyang mi snang ste// me dang nor bu lha kun 'od kyang med/ rgyal ba grong gshegs
202b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rnams mdzes pa/ de tshe 'od rnams thams cad yod min mngon// tshogs chen dang ni bder gshegs lam bzhud de// gang du stobs bcu yi ni zhabs 'jog par/
202b5(mdo sde): sa las pad+ma dag ni stong phrag brgya// mdab ma bye ba stong ldan gtsang ma byung // 'dren pa grong khyer mchog tu gshegs pa'i tshe// de na nyal nyil mi gtsang med par gyur// grong khyer thams
202b6(mdo sde): cad dri mchog bdug pa yi// spros dang yid du 'ong ba kun nas ldang // grong dang srang rnams yongs su dag gyur te// rdo dang gseg ma med cing spos chus btab// stobs bcu ldan pa'i bsod
202b7(mdo sde): nams de 'dra ste// rnam pa sna tshogs me tog sil ma bajam// gnod sbyin brgya stong gtum por sems pa dag sangs rgyas mi dbang gser 'dra mthong nas ni// 'dren la dga' brgya
203a1(mdo sde): tshe rab bskyed nas/ sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun skyabs su 'gro/ lha rnams bye ba dang ni brgya phrag stong // mi dbang lta bar 'ongs pa de dag kun// bde bar
203a2(mdo sde): gshegs la me tog char phab ste/ me tog gtor nas nam mkha'i dkyil na 'dug/ rgyal la mi yis me tog gang gtor ba/ nam mkha'i ngos la me tog gdugs su gyur// lha rnams kyis
203a3(mdo sde): ni me tog gtor ba yang // sa steng lha yi me tog bkram par gyur// lha dang mi dang grul bum srin po rnams// de mthong nas ni nam yang ngoms mi myong // mgon po stobs bcu ldan pa mthong
203a4(mdo sde): nas kyang // rab tu dga' zhing sems bde rangs par gyur// nam tshe skyes bu mchog gi sku mthong nas// sems can thams cad dga' mgu rangs gyur pas// lha yi me tog la yang yid
203a5(mdo sde): mi sems// de dag la ni ngo mtshar 'dzin pa med// stobs bcu'i g.yas phyogs na ni tshangs pa ste// de bzhin g.yon na brgya byin lha yi rgyal// nam mkha'i dkyil na lha mangs bye 'khod
203a6(mdo sde): de skyes bu mchog la shin tu gus pa bskyed// lha dang lha min dag gis rgyal bar bskor// lha dang mi yi dpal gzi kun phrogs nas// zhabs mthil sa la ri mo 'byin bzhin du// grong
203a7(mdo sde): khyer du ni bcom ldan spyan drangs gshegs// sku lus dpe byad bzang pos rgyas pa ni// nam mkha' skar ma dag gis gang ba bzhin// nam mkha' la ni zla ba nya ba ltar// rgyal po'i lam na sangs
203b1(mdo sde): rnam sam ma brlags/ nor bu na ngaranamangag bzang pa ni/ gces pa'i byo dral rab tu byung bar bye byoms dang phyogs marnams sa'ang bodadagacang 'byub bzhin rgyub /
203b2(mdo sde): nga mad/ kyadang bya gagis rgyal ba bsor/ mi yin ci brgyal pa'i rabatug shegs/ zhabs ma khrimam sa ma 'byin pa sa rdza 'ongag mod du'i byem
203b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas gshegs/ thong ltar mchog ni kun tu lags brgyan te// rgyal mtshan bye ba phrag stong rab tu bsgred // de mis kun spos bzang rnam par thugs// mir 'o dang bzhin
203b4(mdo sde): dbyar gyi me tog gtor// gang tsha bder gshegs gtam rnams ston pa na// mgon po srang bzung mi la thugs brtse'i phyir/ brgyal bas der ni 'phrul pa rnam sprul te// de dag la yang
203b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas chos dbang ston// srog chags brgya stong dag gis de thos nas// sangs rgyas ye shes mchog la sngon lam 'debs// nam bdag 'od 'dra'i ye shes thob snyam ste/
203b6(mdo sde): bsam pa mkhyen nas rgyal ba lung yang ston// gang gi rgyal ba mi dbang spyan drangs pa// sbyin pa de ni mu mtha' med 'gyur te/ rnyed mchog bsam gyis mi khyab de rnyed ces/ la la dag
203b7(mdo sde): ni de la mos pa bskyed// 'khor ba dag na shin tu mthong dka' ba// skye dgu dag la phan mdzad thugs kyang brtse// thugs rje can de bdag gis sang la yang // spyan drang snyam
204a1(mdo sde): dul la sems kyang bskyed// la la ba gam cog gi steng 'dug cing // lus ni shin tu sdug cing mdzes par gyur// byang chub sems mchog dam pa bskyed nas ni/
204a2(mdo sde): stobs bcu ldan la lA mi me tog 'thor// la la zla med sems mchog rab bskyed nas// me tog tsam pa mdzes pa'i phreng ba dang / a ti mug ta de bzhin dbyar gyi spos// dar gyi lda ldi dag
204a3(mdo sde): kyang la la 'thor// kha cig gos kyis shin tu lus brgyan te// me tog bzang po dag kyang thogs shing 'greng // me tog sna tshogs dar gyi lda ldi thogs// rgyal ba thub chen de yi phyogs su mthor/
204a4(mdo sde): lal pad+ma dang ni ku mud// ut+pal gser gyi me tog bzang po 'thor// la la rin chen me tog nges 'thor te// la la tsan dan phye ma 'thor bar byed// 'dren pa grong khyer mchog tu gshegs pa'i
204a5(mdo sde): tshe/ ngo mtshar dpag tu med pa rnams kyang 'byung // mtshungs med de dag brjod par mi nus te// sangs rgyas ye shes skye bo bye mangs bkod// mi che mi gdungs bden pa mthong ba dang
204a6(mdo sde): gzhan yang gya nom snang dang shin tu mthong // de bzhin 'og min 'dod chags bral ba rnams// thams cad mi dbang lta phyir nye bar lhags// de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha rnams dpag med dang /
204a7(mdo sde): dge chung lha gzhan dag kyang sems dga' zhing // dge rgyas khrag khrig dpag tu med pa rnams// 'dren pa drang srong chen po lta phyir lhags// tshad med 'od kyang de bzhin dpag med dang /
204b1(mdo sde): 'od chung gi ni lha rnams ji yod dang // 'od gsal ba yang khrag khrig mang po der// 'jig rten mgon po lta phyir de dag lhags// tshangs 'khor ba dag brgya stong mang po dang / tshangs pa'i mdun
204b2(mdo sde): 'don dad pa de bzhin te// tshangs ris kyang ni brgya phrag mang po rnams// thams cad 'dren pa lta phyir nye bar lhags// de bzhin gzhan 'phrul gyi yang lha rnams dang // gzhan yang 'phrul dga'
204b3(mdo sde): sems can dag pa dang // dga' ldan 'thab bral lha rnams rab dga' zhing // thams cad sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal nye bar lhags// brgya byin lha rgyal sum cu rtsa gsum pa/ lha yi bu mo bye ba
204b4(mdo sde): brgya dang lcags// 'dir ni me tog char kyang rab 'bebs shing // sangs rgyas thub dbang lta phyir nye bar lhags// phyogs bzhi'i 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po yang // rnam thos bu dang klu dbang mig
204b5(mdo sde): mi bzang // yul 'khor srung dang 'phags skyes sems dga' ste// de kun mi dbang stod cing nye bar lhags// gnod sbyin rgyal po mthu ldan oMr 'bir yang // dga' ba skyes shing gnod sbyin
204b6(mdo sde): brgyas bskor te// nam mkha'i dkyil na 'dug cing sems dka' nas// me tog sna tshogs du ma'i char yang 'bebs// rtag tu myos dang 'phreng 'dzin lha rnams kyang // spos dang 'phreng ba rnam
204b7(mdo sde): pa sna tshogs thogs// 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad sems dga' zhing // de na skyes bu mchog la mchod pa byed// gnod sbyin lag na gzhong thogs mang po yang // gnod sbyin bu mo de
205a1(mdo sde): dag rab brgyan te// gnod sbyin rol mo rab tu snyan pa dang // shin tu yid 'ong brgyas ni sangs rgyas mchod// glu dbyangs sil snyan 'jam zhing snyan pa la/
205a2(mdo sde): mkhas pa mi 'am ci yi bu mo stong // mi 'am ci yi rgyal po ljon pa dang // rgyal mchog mchod par spos ngad ldang las lhags// bde mchog stobs ldan sgragacan thags bzangs ris// lha min/
205a3(mdo sde): bu mo stong gi 'khor bcas dang // lha min rdzu 'phrul chen po gzhan mang yang // rin po che yi char phab nye bar lhags// srin po khrag khrig brgya phrag mtha' yas kyang // srin po bye ba brgya yis bsnyen bkur
205a4(mdo sde): zhing // me tog sil ma sna tshogs mang po yang // skyes bu mchog la gus par rab tu 'thor// klu yi rgyal po ri bo legs pa yang // 'khor mang de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du lpags// rin chen me tog
205a5(mdo sde): rnam mang mchog thogs te// bde gshegs zhabs gnyis la ni rab tu 'dud// klu dbang pad+ma dang ni pad+ma che// de bzhin nor yod mtha' yas gdengs ka can// de dag khyu mchog drung du nyer
205a6(mdo sde): lhags te// bde bar gshegs la gus par rab tu 'dud// gru yi rgyal po nor bu yid dga' zhing // khyu mchog zhabs kyi drung ngu che bar 'ongs// klu yi me tog dri zhim mchog thogs te/ cang mi
205a7(mdo sde): ring bde gshegs spyan sngar 'dug/ de bzhin ma dros klu yi rgyal po yang // klu yi bu mo shin tu bslabs po'i mchog/ rnga dang sil snyan stong phrag brgya bdung zhing // 'jig rten mgon po maH
205b1(mdo sde): phyir nye bar lhags// ma dros pa yi bu mo lnga brgya dag/ ye shes yangs pa bla med tshol ba'i phyir// gnyen 'dab dag gis bskor cing dgar gyur nas// rang gis rang byung mchod phyir nye bar lhags/
205b2(mdo sde): de bzhin gru yi rgyal po sogs med kyang // skyes bu mchog ma thal sgrar rab tu nas// klu li mu tig mdzes shing babang ba thogs/ mkha' la 'dug nas thub rgya la mchod pa byed// de bzhin du ma
205b3(mdo sde): rgyal po btang zung yang // rab tu yid bde dga' mgu skyes nas ni// rin chen mu tig sna tshogs thogs nas su// der 'ongs 'dren pa la yang mngon par 'thor// de bzhin gru yi rgyal po dus
205b4(mdo sde): can yang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung ngu nyer 'ongs te// dga' zhing rin chen 'phreng ba mdzes mchog thogs// skyes bu dam pa la yang mchod rab byas/ de yang bde gshegs yon tan rjes
205b5(mdo sde): dran zhing // gus pa chen po shin tu bskyed nas ni// gnyen 'dab klu mang dag gis re bskor cing // 'dren pa'i sngags pa rnam pa mang po brjod// de bzhin klu dbang dga' bo nye dga' dang // de
205b6(mdo sde): bzhin 'jog po 'goru tam nag po yang // rgyal ba lta zhing der ni nye bar 'ongs// bde bar gshegs pa'i zhabs la 'dud pa byed// klu yi rgyal po e la'i mdab ma yang // thub mchog rgyal ba
205b7(mdo sde): 'od srungs dran pa dang // bdag nyid mi khom skyes pa mthong nas ni// klu brgyas yongs su bskor te ngu zhing 'ongs// kye ma bdag sngon the tsom byung gyur te// bdag gis e la'i 'dab sdong sngon
206a1(mdo sde): bcang bas// des ni mi khom par yang bdag skyes te// rgyal ba'i chos ni rim par sa pa min// shin tu spad pa'i skye bo'i lus 'di dang / klu yi skye gnas bdag gis
206a2(mdo sde): rab spangs la// chos bang byang chub snying por skyes mchog gis// rtogs pa bsil ba bdag gis rtogs par byas// klu yi rgyal po rgya mtsho 'khor lo sgyur// bye ba gsum snyer klu yi 'khor gyis
206a3(mdo sde): bskor// chu lha gzi can rin chen mo shal thogs// bcom ldan 'das la mchod phyir nye bar 'ongs// rgyal ba la ni rdo 'phangs des bzung ste// de tshen ma mkha' la yang 'dug gyur pa/ rgyal
206a4(mdo sde): po'i khab kyi gnod sbyin ci zhig 'dzin// bde bar gshegs pa'i spyan sngar gus par 'jug/ lung lo can gyi rgyal po'i gnas kun kyang // stong par gyur cing gnod sbyin gang yang med// thams/
206a5(mdo sde): cad kyis kyang phan tshun dam bcas te// 'jig rten mgon po lta bar thams cad lpags// de bzhin bong rnga dang ni khab spu dang / gnod sbyin 'brog nas 'jig byed de bzhin te// gangs
206a6(mdo sde): gnas rir 'du ga nod sbyin bung bu dag/ rgyal ba rang byung drung du nye bar lcags// dbang po'i rtog dang gzugs bzang rang rod can// ba ku la dang dus 'phel lnga po dang // gnod sbyin dbang po/
206a7(mdo sde): gzhan yang stobs rnams ni// bdug sngos snod rnams thog shing nye bar lhags// lug dbyibs ma legs mi sdug mang po rnams// gzugs kyi rnam pa mang zhing rgyan bor ba// de yi mdun
206b1(mdo sde): rab rgya stong mang po dag/ gnod sbyin gyi ni me tog thogs te lpags// go'u tam ri byi pur bu rgyal byed ngas/ ko'u shi ka dang 'od srungs man kand/ thams cad bshes dang bar shag dag
206b2(mdo sde): dag/ thams cad sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal nye bar lhags// mi sbyin yang ni de bzhin dga' mgu ste// drang srong rgyas pa kud tsa ang gir// shed can ngan spong bad tsag nas mchog rnams//
206b3(mdo sde): de dag sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal nye bar lhags// 'dza' mnab man pa'i shal ba ya dang // 'dza' mag ni dang grog ma khar drang srong mchog/ dka' bar gnas dang mi'u thung ldan pa rnams/
206b4(mdo sde): 'dren pa lta zhing grong khyer mchog tu lhags// drang srong mthong nas de tshe drang srong dga'// thub dga' zhabs mchog la ni phyag 'tshal zhing // 'jig rten sgron la phyag byas mngon bstod de/
206b5(mdo sde): thal mo sbyar nas dpa' bo'i spyan sngar 'greng // 'jig rten ci yod drang srong mang po kun// de dag mi dbang lta bar nyer lhags te// mthong nas mchod pa rgya cher byas nas kyang / sas
206b6(mdo sde): rgyas spyan sngar thal mo rab sbyor 'jug/ rgya mtsho dag na gnas pa'i rnam mkha' lding / bram ze cha byad du'ang sprul byas nas// cod pa na sa tshogs bstan sdug pa thogs/ bde
206b7(mdo sde): ga she gas la phyag 'tshal nas ma khar 'khod// grong brgya dang ni 'dzam gling nags tshas na// gnas shing rten po'i lha rnams bag yod dang / zong gi lha mo ma lus thams cad kyang /
207a1(mdo sde): bar lhags shing gtso bo mchod pa byed/ nags tshal gyi yang lha rnams mtha' yas dang / ri yi lha rnams thams cad nye bar 'ongs// 'bab chu'i lha kun mtha'
207a2(mdo sde): ngag de bzhin du// 'dren pa mchod pa byed cing nye bar lhags// mya ngan dgon pa'i lha mo brgya rnams dang // ri'i rtse'i lha mo ji snyed ma lus dang // mtsho dang chu mig dzing gi lha rnams dang /
207a3(mdo sde): rgya mtsho'i lha yang sangs rgyas drung du lhags// lha dang lha min klu dang gnod sbyin tshogs// mi 'am ci dang grul bum nam mkha' lding // de bzhin yi dgas srul po mang po dag/ skyes bu/
207a4(mdo sde): mchog la ri mor bya ba byed// 'dzin pa grong khyer mchog der gshegs pa na/ rgyal ba mchog la de dag mchod pa byed// lha dang lha min klu dang gnod sbyin rgyal/ lta bas rtag tu chog/
207a5(mdo sde): par yod mi 'gyur// sngon gyi srid par 'jig rten mgon po yis// sngon gyi rgyal bdag la mchod mchog byas// bsod nams 'bras bu smin pa de 'dra ste// skyes bu mi dbang lta bas
207a6(mdo sde): ngoms mi myong // rgyal bas sangs rgyas zhing du 'ong btang ste// lhun po de bzhin rab lhun khor yug ri// kha ba can gyi ri dang spos dang ldan// de dag rgyal ba'i 'od la sgrib pa med//
207a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas zhing 'di'i rgya mtsho ji yod pa// de dag de tshes dang 'dra bar gyur// sangs rgyas zhing 'di thams cad kun tu yang // me tog dag gis gtor cing mnyam par gyur// 'od
207b1(mdo sde): ra brgya stong dpag tu mer ba dag chos kyi rgyal po'i zhabs kyi mthil nas byung // sems can dbral ba thams cad bsil bar gyur/ sdug bsngal med par byas nas ba bgrong /
207b2(mdo sde): der ni stobs bcwa ldan pas chos bshad pas// lha dang mi yi mig kyang rnam par dag sog chags brgya stong dpag tu med pa rnams// thams cad sangs rgyas ye shes nges par/
207b3(mdo sde): gyur// 'dren pa grong khyer mchog tu gshegs pa na// bder gshegs cho 'phrul mang po bdag gis ni// bskal pa bye bar brjod du mi smra ste/ rgyal ba bder gshegs 'gro ba
207b4(mdo sde): thams cad dga'// bder gshegs yon tan de dag dpag med de// mi mchog yon tan rab kyi pha rol phyin// yon tan khyad par kun gyi pha rol son// sangs rgyas bsod nams zhing la
207b5(mdo sde): mgos phyag 'tshal// grong khyer du gshegs pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa'i khyim gyi sang du byung ste/ dz+ra
207b6(mdo sde): 'od gzhon nur gyur pa'i khyim du gshegs so// gshegs nas gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so// byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang // dge slong gi dge 'dun kyang so sor gar 'os
207b7(mdo sde): pa'i stan la 'khod do// de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun bzhugs par rig nas// mchod yon
208a1(mdo sde): chen po rims kyis gsol te/ zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa bzang zhing mang ba'i bza' ba dang // bca' ba dang / ldag pa dang / bzhib pa dang / btung ba rnams
208a2(mdo sde): bdag nyid kyis gsol cing bdar te/ bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol nas/ lhung bzed bzhag ste phyag bcabs par rig nas ras bcos bu phrugs bye ba stong phrag brgya ri ba/
208a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la gsol to// byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la yang so sor chos gos sum phrugs su phul nas/ stan las langs te bla gos phrag sa
208a4(mdo sde): gcig tu bzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lha'i me tog man+da ras gtor te/ mchod cing mngon par bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom
208a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshogs su bcad pas mngon par bstod do// skyes pa med cing 'gags med pa// sku lus mi mnga' bsam mi khyab// gzugs dang mtshan ni phun sum tshogs// yon
208a6(mdo sde): tan rgya mtsho phyag 'tshal lo// dpa' bo shes rab mchog gis bskyed// thabs dang stobs kyi rtsal kyang mnga'// sangs rgyas nam mkha' 'dra ba ste// bzong mthar phyin la phyag 'tshal lo//
208a7(mdo sde): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhugs pa'i spyod yul te// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzim mal rab tu dga' dang bde// btung bar ting nge 'dzin te bshos su bsam gtan mchog/ stong nyid dgon
208b1(mdo sde): bar gnas pa khyod la phyag 'jam ma// rgyal bas thugs rje bsnyen pas na// gzugs kyi sku yang ston par mdzad// sems can dag la thugs brtse'i phyir/ btung dang bshos kyang gsol bar
