208b2(mdo sde): gda'// e ma sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab// 'jig rten kun gyi 'dren pa ste// 'jig rten 'di ni khyod mchod nas// mya ngan 'das pa mchog tu mchi// mi mnyam mnyam pa'i mgon gcig
208b3(mdo sde): ba la de skad bstod// gzhon nu yid kyang rab tu dga' gyur tshig smras pa/ sangs rgyas mtshungs med bsam yas sku mnga' bshos gsol bas// lha yi lha khyod bzhin du bdag cag sangs rgyas
208b4(mdo sde): gyur// de ltar zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas// bcom ldan 'das la lha'i zhal zas ro brgya pa ni bzhes par gsol// lha'i na bza' rin gtang med pa phrugs kyis ni sku la gsol// lha'i me tog
208b5(mdo sde): man+da ras ni bcom ldan 'das la mchod// tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshogs su bcad pas ni mngon par bstod nas// bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te// bcom ldan 'das la yid
208b6(mdo sde): kyis tshigs su bcad pas zhu ba nus pa// byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pas ci spyad na// rtag tu chos rnams rang bzhin rab tu 'tshal// mkhas pa bgyi ba dag la ji ltar 'jug/ bgyi
208b7(mdo sde): bar 'jug pa 'dren pas bsun du gsol// 'dren pa skye brngan pa ji ltar 'gyur// ji ltar mangs rag tu yang yong mi ste// ji lta bur na 'khor rnams mi phyed 'gyur// de la ji ltar spobs pa
209a1(mdo sde): mtha' yas 'gyur// sems can kun gyi spyod pa rab tu mkhyen// chos rnams kun la mngon par mkhyen pa 'jug/ rkang gnyis gtso bo zil gyis mi non pa// nub du
209a2(mdo sde): yi bdag la lung ston cig/ chos kyi rang bzhin dngos med rab mkhyen la// brjod du med pa tshig tu brjod pa mdzad// seng ges la rnams ji ltar 'pham bgyis pa// mu stegs can la'ang
209a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas de bzhin te// sems can kun gyi spyod pa rab mkhyen cing // chos rnams kun la'ang ye shes rjes su 'jug/ ye shes chags med spyod yul yongs su dag/ chos kyi mnga' ba dag
209a4(mdo sde): bdag la de lung ston// 'das pa mkhyen cing ma 'ongs de bzhin te// da ltar 'dim ci mchis pa yang mkhyen// dus gsum la ni ye shes thogs med 'jug/ de phyir bdag chu shAkya seng ge la/
209a5(mdo sde): dus gsum ldan pa'i rgyal ba'i chod nyid ni// chos kyi rgyal pos chos nyid rab tu mkhyen// rang byung chos kyi ngo bo nyid la mkhas// de phyir bdag zhu ye shes rgya mtsho la// khyod la 'khrul pa'i
209a6(mdo sde): chos ni ci yang med// de bas khyod kyi sems pa ma lus spangs// mdud spangs tha ba gti mug rab tu bcad// mi dbang bdag la byang chub spyod pa ston// chos kyi mtshan nyid ci 'drar rgyal bas
209a7(mdo sde): mkhyen// chos kyi mtshan nyid de 'dra ba dag la ston// bdag gis mtshan nyid de 'dra'i chos rtogs nas// mtshan nyid de 'dra'i byang chub spyod baspyad// sems can sbyor ba mi mthun mtha'
209b1(mdo sde): mas pa/ ji trar spyod pasdud pa 'jug pa lags/ gang thos sems cadan spyod pa 'tshal 'gyur ba/ sbyor la 'jug pa 'angs la bshad du gsol/ mtshan nyid mi mthun chos kyi nga bzhi/
209b2(mdo sde): mtshan// rngan cid stong rang po'i rnam dag pa// byang chub sems dpas ji ltar mngon sum 'gyur/ chos kyi tshul rnams bdag la bsum du gsol// 'di la chos rnams kyi gyi pa rom phyin
209b3(mdo sde): bstan pa'i tshig kunapa yang shin dum pas/ rdo tsam mi mdang nem dur thoms chod// bdag sa sangs rgyas byang chub bstan du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
209b4(mdo sde): 'od gzhon nur gyur pa'i sems kyi rtog pa sems kyi mkhyen nas/ rdza 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gcig dang ldanan
209b5(mdo sde): yon tan 'di dag rab tu 'thob ste/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// chos gcig po gang zhe na/ gnon nu 'di la byang chub sems
209b6(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid shes pa yin no// gzhon nu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid shes she na/ gzhon nu 'di
209b7(mdo sde): la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos thams cad ming med cing ming dang bral bar rab tu shes so// chos thams cad sgra med pa tshig gi lam dang bral ba yi ge dang
210a1(mdo sde): bral ba/ skye ba dang bral ba 'gog pa dang bral ba/ rgyu dang mtshan nyid mi mthun pa rkyen dang mtshan nyid mi mthun pa/ dben pa'i mtshan nyid 'di lta ste ga mtshan nyid//
210a2(mdo sde): med par mtshan nyid gcig pa/ mtshan nyid dang bral ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa bsam pa dang bral ba yid dang bral bar rab tu shes so// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs
210a3(mdo sde): su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// chos rnams bstan pa gcig po ni/ chos rnams thams cad mtshan nyid med// yang dag ji bzhin rab mkhyen pa// shes rab mchog gis bshad pa yin/
210a4(mdo sde): de lta bur ni chos bstan rnams// byang chub sems dpa' sus shes pa// mdo sde bye ba rab ston kyang // de la byang chub rgyun 'chad med// 'dren pas byin gyis brlabs pas na// yang dag
210a5(mdo sde): nyid kyi mtha' yas shes// yang dag mtha' de rab shes na// de la ci'ang bshad pa med// gcig gis kyang ni thams cad shes// gcig gis kyang ni thams cad mthong // ji snyed mang por
210a6(mdo sde): bshad na yang // de la dregs pa skye ba med// chos rnams thams cad bdag med par// de ltar sems kyis des brtags shing / ming du bstan pa bslabs pa na// yang dag nyid du tshig
210a7(mdo sde): kyang smra// sgra dbyangs gang dag ci thos pa// de yi sngon gyi mtha' shes te// sgra yi sngon gyi mtha' shes nas// sgra dag gis ni de mi 'phrogs// sgra yi sngon mtha' ji 'dra bar// chos rnams
210b1(mdo sde): mtshan nyid de bzhin te// chos rnams de ltar rang shes na/ mngal du skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ chos rnams thams cad mi skye zhing 'byung ba med par rab tu shes bstan pa 'di ni rab shes
210b2(mdo sde): n+ya brtag tu sde badran par 'gyur// nam zhig skye badran gyur na// de tshe b+ha ba dag la 'jug/ bya ba dag la zhugs pa mo// 'khor rnams shin tu mi phyer 'gyur/ de ltar chos rnams
210b3(mdo sde): stong par ni// byang chub sems dpa' sus shes pa// des ni gang yang mi shes med// 'di ni ci'ang med pa'i mtha'// ci yang med pa'i mtha' la yang / byis pa dag gis ci dag
210b4(mdo sde): brtags// bskal pa bye bar de dag de// yang dang yang du 'khor bar gyur// ji ltar 'dren pas mkhyen pa bzhin// gal te de dag rtog rig na// de las sdug bsngal mi skye ste// ngan
210b5(mdo sde): 'gro rnams su'ang de mi 'gro// so so'i skye bo thams cad kyis// de ltar tshul 'di ma shes pas// gang du chos rnams 'gag pa yi// 'di 'ja'i chos rnams spong bar byed// chos
210b6(mdo sde): kun rnyed pa med par ni// chos kyi 'du shes gang byung ba// de lta bu mi 'du shes de/ 'du shes de ltar rig par gyis/ rnam par shes dang 'du shes su// byis pa dag gis 'di brtags te/
210b7(mdo sde): brtags pa yi ni chos rnams la// mkhas pa 'di ni rmongs mi 'gyur// stong pa rnyog pa med pa'i chos// 'di ni mkhas pa'i sa yin te// 'di la byis pa'i spyod yul med// sangs rgyas
211a1(mdo sde): sras kyi spyod yul lo// zhi stong pa rab bstan pa// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa// 'di ni sangs rgyas sras spyod pa// sangs rgyas chos kyi rgyan yin no// 'di
211a2(mdo sde): ltar byang chub sems dpa' dag/ bag chags rab tu spangs gyur pa// de dag gzugs kyis mi 'phrogs te// sangs rgyas rigs la de dag gnas/ chos rnams thams cad gnas med de/
211a3(mdo sde): de dag la ni gnas yod min// gang gis de ltar gnas shes pa// de la byang chub rnyed mi dka'// sbyin dang tshul khrims thos dang bzod// bshes gnyen bzang po bsten byas nas// bya ba
211a4(mdo sde): 'di dag rnam rig na// byang chub myur du de 'tshang rgya// de la lha klu rtag tu bkur sti byed// gnod sbyin lha min lto 'phye dri za dang / nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po thams cad dang / mi 'am ci dang
211a5(mdo sde): srin pos mchod pa byed// sangs rgyas bye ba de yi snyan pa brjod// bskal pa bye ba mang por mi chad par// chos bshad pa yi bsngags pa brjod na yang // de yi mu mtha' zad par nus mi 'gyur//
211a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' gang gis stong shes pa// de ni srog chags bye ba'i don mang byed// shin tu nges pa 'khor la chos ston te// thos nas dga' zhing ri mor bya ba skyed// de dag gis ni ye shes
211a7(mdo sde): yangs pa 'byung // de phyir rgyal ba mi mchog mthong bar 'gyur// zhing rnams na yang bkod pa bzang po mthong // 'jig rten mgon po de la chos rnams ston// chos kun sgyu ma lta bur shes par
211b1(mdo sde): rgyas rjes rab snang rang bzhin thong bskur// dengag gi yang rang bzhin de 'ja shes/ de slar srung ba tsal 'ang chags mi 'gyur/ ye shes chags pa ma cing ngon byed cing / 'jig
211b2(mdo sde): na namang drung drub spyad mchog spyod// shes pas chos kun la'ang rab brtags te// de dag shing rnams gzhan du sprul pa 'thor// sprul pa de dag sangs rgyas ngor byas nas/ ji
211b3(mdo sde): chos che bzhin du rang bzhin 'gyur/ byang chub sems la mi gang gnas pa rnams/ bsam pa ji bzhin don rnams rnying par 'gyur// sangs rgyas rigs ni gnas par gang brtson pa/
211b4(mdo sde): rtag tu sangs rgyas byas pa gso// rnam par 'khar ba'i lus dang rab ldan zhing // mtshan bzangs sum cu rtsa gnyis de la 'byung // phan yon gzhan sa mang po mtha' yas pa// ting 'dzin mchogs
211b5(mdo sde): spyod pas thob par 'gyur// rtag tu mi sprul stobs kyang che bar 'gyur// de yi gzi brjid rgyal pos mi bzod de// mkhas pa suM dag sangs rgyas chos spyod pa// byad bzhin bzang zhing shin tu
211b6(mdo sde): mdzes par 'gyur// bsod nams gzi brjid dpal gyis mngon 'phags te// lhas kyang de yi gzi brjid bzod mi 'gyur/ su dag byang chub sems la brtan gnas pa/ de ni rtag tu
211b7(mdo sde): srog chags kun gyi bshes// sangs rgyas byang chub 'di ni rab ston pa// de la nam yang mun pa med par 'gyur// sgra dang tshig gi lam bral brjod du med/ nam mkha' ci bzhin chos
212a1(mdo sde): rang bzhin te// 'di lta bu yi tshul mchog rnams rigs na// de yi spobs pa dag kyang mi zang 'gyur/ mdo sde dag ni brgya stong rab bshad kyang // sngon gyi mtha'
212a2(mdo sde): ma phra zhingab rab tu shes/ chos kyi rang bzhin shin tu phra shes pas/ mkhas pa'i tshig ni rtag tu thogs pa med// rtag par tshul brgya dag la mkhas gyur cing / snga dang nges tshig rnam pa
212a3(mdo sde): mngal mkhas// las dang 'bras bu rnam smin nges pa ste// khyad par 'phags pa'i bye brag de 'drar 'gyur// mkhas pa bdag nyid chen po stobs bcu'i sras// ma tshang med pa'i stobs kyi
212a4(mdo sde): shugs 'chang zhing // shin tu phra ba'i rang bzhin chos shes pas/ de yi dran pa rtag par yongs su dag/ shin tu phra ba'i rang bzhin chos shes pas// yid du mi 'ong sgra ni thos mi 'gyur/
212a5(mdo sde): rtag tu snyan cing yid 'ong sbra yang thos// de yi tshig ni rtag tu yid 'ong 'gyur// shin tu phra ba'i rang bzhin chos shes pas// dran dang blo gros shes rab rtogs dang ldan// de bzhin sems kyang
212a6(mdo sde): rnyog med dang par 'gyur// mdo sde brgya phrag du ma rab tu 'chang // yon tan 'di 'dra'i rang bzhin chos shes pas// lha dang mi dang klu 'brug srin po dang // lha min yi ge dang ni tshig rnams
212a7(mdo sde): 'byed la mkhas// tha dad pa yi sgra mang du ma shes// don dang tshig 'bru la yang mkhas par 'gyur// shin tu phra ba'i rang bzhin chos shes pas// lha dang mi dang klu 'brug srin po dang /
212b1(mdo sde): ma mam sto 'phye ma 'am cil yang / gtag tu sdug cing ying du 'ong bar 'gyur/ shin tum ba'i rang bzhin chos shes pas/ byung ba yi dgas srin pa'i tshogs rnams ni shal ba bshin/
212b2(mdo sde): tu mi bzad pa// de dag nam yang de la 'jigs mi skyed// mkhas pa de dag yangs pa'i gtam thos nas// shin tu dga' zhing ba sdu bing zhes byed// sangs rgyas la yang dga' ba rgya cher
212b3(mdo sde): snong // de dag bsam gyis mi khyab don chen 'thob// bde bar gshegs pa'i chos mdzod 'di bzung ba'i// bskam pa stong mngar mi bsod nams stobs// rab tu brjod kyang rdzogs par mi nus/
212b4(mdo sde): te// dpag tu med cing mtha' yas tshad med do// ting 'dzin zhi ba'i mchog 'di bzung ba yis// 'das pa'i rgyal ba dpag med thams cad dang // sangs rgyas ma byon pa dang phyogs bcur/
212b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas gang bzhugs de dag de yis mchod// skyes bu la la bsod nams 'dod pas 'dir// stobs bcu ldan pa'i thugs rje can dag la// dga' ba dpag tu med pa bskyed nas ni// bskal pa/
212b6(mdo sde): mtha' yas dpag med rim gro byas// skyes bu gnyis pa bsod nams 'dod pa yis// don dam tshul 'di las ni tshigs bcad gcig/ phyi ma'i dus su gyur tshe 'dzin pa ni// de la snga ma'i bsod/
212b7(mdo sde): nams char mi phod// 'di ni sangs rgyas mchod pa rab mchog ste// phyi ma mi bzad dus su gyur pa'i tshe// 'di las tshig bzhi'i tshogs bcad gcig thos nas// 'dzin pa de ni sangs rgyas thams cad
213a1(mdo sde): mchod// de dag rtag tu rnyed mchog legs par rnyed// de dag grong gi zas mchog legs pa zos// stobs bcu'i sras kyi thu bo dam pa ste// de yis rgyal ba mang po
213a2(mdo sde): yun ring mchod// bya rgor phung po'i ri 'dirang yang mthong // de dag sangs rgyas mkhyen la ngas lung bstan// mya ngan nga 'das nas ni byams pa yang // de tshe de la lung yang ston par 'gyur// de bzhin
213a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas tshe dpag med pa yang // nga yi bde ba can du kun 'dod zhes// phan yon rnam pa du ma de la 'chad// mngon dga' der song sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs mthong // bskal pa brgya stong dpas/
213a4(mdo sde): tu med pa yang // log par ltung ba'i 'jigs pa yong mi 'byung // byang chub spyad pa mchog 'di spyod pa ni// rtag tu yid rab bde bar myong bar 'gyur// de phyir bye brag 'di 'phags de 'dra ste// 'di
213a5(mdo sde): ni rab tu bshad pa phan yon mchog/ so so'i tshig la nga yi rjes spobs la// phyi ma'i dus la mdo sde 'di zung shig/ mdo sde 'dzin pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//
213a6(mdo sde): gzhon nu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid shes pa de'i yon tan dang phan yon de lta bur 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan dang bsngags
213a7(mdo sde): pa yang dag par smra'o// de bzhin gshegs pa la yang dag pa ma yin pa dang / med pas mi skur to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos gang gis de bzhin gshegs par rab tu dbye ba'i chos nyid de
213b1(mdo sde): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes shing sangs rgyas kyi yon tan mtha' yas pa rab tu shes so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhon nu sangs rgyas kyi yon tan ni mtha' yas te/ bsam gyis mi/
213b2(mdo sde): khyab cing bsam pa dang bral bas na/ de dag bsam pa'am dpag par mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhon nu sems kyi ngo bo nyid ni gzugs med pa bstan du med pa ste gzhon nu de
213b3(mdo sde): ltar sems kyi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi ngo bo nyid kyang de yin no// sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyang de yin no//
213b4(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid gang yin pa/ chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyang de yin te/ gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang de ltar yon tan thams cad kyi ngo
213b5(mdo sde): nyid don cig tu bstan pa/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa de ni/ gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yid kyi nges par brtag pa zhes bya ste/ 'byung ba ma
213b6(mdo sde): mkhas shing khams gsum las byung ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// ji lta ba bzhin du lta zhing log par mi smra/ rnam pa gzhan du mi skrag ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed/ khams
213b7(mdo sde): gsum la yang ma chags shing khams gsum las yang dag par 'das te/ 'dod pa'i sa dang / gzugs kyi sa dang / gzugs med pa'i sa dang / nyon mongs pa'i sa dang / ming ki sa dang
214a1(mdo sde): sgra yi sa las 'das shing yi ge dang chos kyi tshul la mkhas pa ye shes mi zad par bsgoms pas/ brjod du med pa'i chos rtog pa/ yi ge la mkhas pa/ yi ge dang /
214a2(mdo sde): tshig rab tu dbye ba shes pa la mkhas pa/ yi ge dang tshig rab tu dbye ba rgyas pa shes pa la mkhas pa/ chos thams cad rab tu dbye ba shes pa la mkhas pa/ chos thams cad rnam par
214a3(mdo sde): dgod pa la mkhas pa yin te/ gtan la bab pa'i blo dang ldan zhing / bdud sdig can dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis zil gyis mi non to// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ lha dang /
214a4(mdo sde): mi'i skye dgu sngon yongs su byang ba byas pa/ khrag khrig phrag dgu bcu rtsa brgyad kyi bye ba brgya stong 'khyil pa'i gzungs dang / sgrib pa med pa dang / chos rnam par mthong ba'i bzod pa so sor
214a5(mdo sde): thob nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag thams cad la/ bskal pa grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
214a6(mdo sde): par 'tshang rgya ste/ thams cad kyang ming ni tha dad / tshe'i tshad ni gcig par sangs rgyas kyi zhing so sor bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes
214a7(mdo sde): lung bstan to// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' blo dang lnga pa gang / bla na med pa'i byang chub rab tshol zhing // chos dang de bzhin don la mkhas pa de// chos kyi
214b1(mdo sde): ngo bo nyid la spyod pa yin// yang dag ma yin pa yi tshig mi snga// sangs rgyas yon tan bye brag ci 'dra ba// rgyal ba rnams kyi chos ni de yin te// dpa' bo the tsom bral bas shin tu rig/ chos kun
214b2(mdo sde): don gcig par ni rab shes te// mgo gcig tu ni stong pa nyid yin pas// de dag la ni tha dad gyur pa med// don gcig la ni shin tu bsrabs pa yin// rtag pa med cing rnam rtog med pa dang //
214b3(mdo sde): dmigs pa med pas blo gros ldan par shes// zang pa dang ni mi zad 'du shes kyang / ma lus par ni thams cad rab tu grangs// de ni chos sku mi yi seng ge la/ stobs bcu ldan pa gzugs
214b4(mdo sde): su mi lta zhing // de ni phyin ci log kun rab spangs pas// mtshan rnams su'ang lta bar yong mi 'gyur// chos rnams 'di dag bsam mi khyab// bsam dang bral zhing rang bzhin zhi// de lta bu ni
214b5(mdo sde): rab shes nas// rkang gnyis gtso bo sangs rgyas mthong // ji ltar bdag gi 'du shes rig/ de bzhin kun tu blo yang gtong // chos kun de yi rang bzhin te// rnam par dag pa nam mkhara' bzhin/
214b6(mdo sde): yid la bsams kyang 'byung ba med// chos rnams thams cad shes pas na// khams gsum las ni rnam par grol// de la smon lam 'debs pa med// yang dag ji bzhin du ni mthong gyur cing //
214b7(mdo sde): ma log tshig sgra rnam pa gzhan mi smra// de yi tshig dang brjod pa thams cad kyang // rgyal ba dag gi mthu yis 'byung bar 'gyur// 'dod pa'i sa dang nyon mongs sa rnams dang // gzugs dang gzugs
215a1(mdo sde): med las kyang shin tu 'da'// chos rnams la ni yid kyang ma chags shing // rab tu dga' bas 'gro la phan par spyod// mig gi sa las 'das shing sgra yang shes/
215a2(mdo sde): ngo bo nyid kyis gsog tu gyur pa ste// ji srid tsam du yun ring brjod na yang // de la gnas par byed pa yod ma yin// 'du shes rab tu rgyu ba med// lta ba log pa kun nas zad// blo yang shin tu gtan//
215a3(mdo sde): la bab// brtan pa nam mkha' 'dra bar spyod// gal te bdud bye khrag khrig rnams// de yi sems dkrugs phyir 'ongs kyang // bdud rnams thams cad zil mnan te// de yi dbang du 'gro mi
215a4(mdo sde): 'gyur// bdud kyi rgya mo rnam spangs te// tshul khrims yongs dag gdung ba med// bsam gtan dag ni bde la mos// 'jig rten stong par rab tu shes// 'jin rten phung por smras pa yang //
215a5(mdo sde): de dag stong par rab tu rig/ skye ba med cing 'gag med pa// chos rnams thams cad nam mkha' bzhin// de dag bdag nyid gtong byed kyi// stobs bcu'i tshul khrims thos mi gtong // de ni tshul
215a6(mdo sde): khrims pha rol phyin// gar smon par yang skye bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas zhing du rnam par 'gro// sangs rgyas khrag khrig mang po mthong // mtho ris dag ni mi 'dod de// smon lam rnams ni yong mi
215a7(mdo sde): gtong // chos nyid dag ni de spyod tshe// skad cig brtson 'grus nyams mi byed// phyogs bcu yi ni sangs rgyas kyis// de ni shin tu bstod pa yin// de phyir gzhon nu ting 'dzin las// chos 'di/
215b1(mdo sde): dag ni rab thos nas// shes kyi khe ni rnam spong la// skye bo mngal chos rab ston// sangs rgyas yon tan mang ldan pa// rang 'byung 'gyur bar gang 'dod pa// dge ba 'di la rab bslabs nas/
215b2(mdo sde): stobs bcu 'chang ba sangs rgyas 'gyur// ting nge 'dzin rjes su slob pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nu gyur pa la
215b3(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/
215b4(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin nges par bstan pa la mkhas par bya'o// gzhon nu de la ting nge 'dzin nges par bstan pa gang zhe na/ gang chos thams cad kyi ji lta ba bzhin nyid dang / mnyam pa nyid mi mnyam pa med pa/
215b5(mdo sde): dang mi rtog pa rnam par mi rtog pa/ rnam par ma bsgrungs pa kun nas spong ba med pa/ skye ba med pa 'gog pa med pa/ rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa dang / kun tu rtog pa yongs
215b6(mdo sde): su chad pa// sems kyi dmigs pa med pa/ yid la byed pa med pa rnam par rig pa yongs su chad pa/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug yongs su chad pa / mtha' med pa
215b7(mdo sde): mthar yid la byed pa dang bral ba/ yid la byed pa yongs su chad pa phung po dang khams dang / skye mched kyi ngo ba nyid shes pa/ rngan pa dang / blo gros dang / rtogs pa dang / khrel yod pa dang /
216a1(mdo sde): brtan pa dang / cho ga dang / spyod yul dang / namatan gyi gnas su gyur pa nyon mongs pa med pa'i sa ga zhi ba'i sa/ spros pa thams cad yongs su chad pa/
216a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bslab pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod yul/ yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa 'di ni/ gzhon nu ting nge 'dzin nges par bstan pa
216a3(mdo sde): zhes bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin nges par bstan pa 'di la gnas pa ni/ ting nge 'dzin dang ma bral ba yin// sems 'khrul pa med pa yin/ snying rje chen po dang
216a4(mdo sde): ldan zhing / sems can dpag tu med pa'i don byed pa yin no// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// ting 'dzin mnyam pa med pa'i sa// shin tu mthong
216a5(mdo sde): dka' phra zhing zhi// 'du shes thams cad bcom pa ste// de phyir ting nge 'dzin ces bya// rtog pa med cing rnam rtog med// gzung ba med cing bstan du med// sems kyang dmigs pa med pa ste/
216a6(mdo sde): de phyir ting nge 'dzin ces bya// nam zhig mnyam par gzhag gyur te// chos kun la ni rlom sems med// rlom sems med pa ji bzhin pa// de ni ting nge 'dzin ces bsgrags// chos ni rdul tsam
216a7(mdo sde): yod med de// rdul ces bya ba'ang yong ma yin// chos rnams dmigs su med pa ste// de phyir ting nge 'dzin ces bya// sems kyi dmigs pa med pa yang // de ni rnam par rtog ces bya// chos
216b1(mdo sde): dadam par ma brtags pa/ desar cing 'dzin shes par bris// bla mes don rnams rab btun te/ sma cid kyang dngom po med/ sgyuni zag cha swA hAs/ bar snang dag gis nam mkha' bas
216b2(mdo sde): chos 'di rnams ni mi gnas te// 'di dag la ni gnas mi dmigs/ mi gnas pa ni gnas kyi slar/ ngo bo nyid kyis mi rnyed do// 'gro zhing 'chi 'phor brjod pa yi/ de lta bu mi
216b3(mdo sde): 'gro ba med// 'gro ba med pa 'gro ba'i sgras// ting nge 'dzin du de phyir gsungs/ mnyam gzhag ma yin de ni rlom sems brjod// mnyam gzhag 'di yang rlom sems gnyis pa ste/
216b4(mdo sde): rlom sems med par byang chub rig par spyod// dran pa rlom sems med pa byang chub mchog mnyam dang mi mnyam zhi ba sangs rgyas sa// zhi gnas lhag mthong mtshan med 'di yin te/ zhi ba
216b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas sa 'di bsten byas nas// ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di la de brtson yin// don gyi rnam pa rig pa 'jug pa la// yi ge dag gis 'jug par mi nus te// sgra dbyangs thams cad rnam par
216b6(mdo sde): spangs nas ni// mnyam par gzhag 'gyur de la rlom sems med// byang chub sems dpa' gang dag ting 'dzin 'di// ji ltar bshad bzhin gnas shing brtson byed na// gal te zhing 'di
216b7(mdo sde): bskal pas tshig gyur kyang // ri mchog dbus su zhugs pas mes mi tshig/ bskal pa brgya phrag mang por rab bsregs kyang // nam mkha' sngan chad nam yang mi tshig bzhin// chos rnams
217a1(mdo sde): nam mkha' mtshungs par rnam rig pas// de ni me yi nang du long mi 'tshig/ gal te sangs rgyas zhing rnams 'bar gyur la// 'bar ba 'di dag ma lus zhi shig ces/
217a2(mdo sde): ting 'dzin gnas nas smon lam 'di btab na// sa rnams zhig kyang de la 'gyur ba med// de ni rdzu 'phrul stobs kyang mtha' yas 'gyur// nam mkha' la yang thogs pa med par 'gro// rjes
217a3(mdo sde): su bstan bzhin ting 'dzin gnas pa ni// byang chub sems dpa' yon tan 'di dag myong // skye zhing 'chi 'phor de 'gyur yang // skye ba med cing 'chi 'pho med// gang gis de ltar rnam rig pa//
217a4(mdo sde): de la ting 'dzin rnyed mi dka'// 'chi 'pho skye ba med par ni// 'jig rten mgon pos rab tu bshad// de ltar 'jig rten mgon rig nas// de phyir ting nge 'dzin kyang rig/ 'jig rten gyis ni
217a5(mdo sde): mgos shing // 'jig rten chos la mi chags te// lus ni thogs pa med par yang // sangs rgyas zhing du 'gro bar byed// zhing dgra na ni 'jig rten 'dren// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rtag
217a6(mdo sde): mthong // sangs rgyas dag gis zhing bshad pa// chos rnams de dag der yang nyan// de la mi shes yong med de// chos kyi dbyings dang rab tu 'chad// chos kyi rnam par rtag tu rig
217a7(mdo sde): ni chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul// bskal pa bye bar 'chad ston kyang // de yi spobs pa zad mi 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' gzhan mang ngo // mkhas pa dag kyang sprul par byed// byang chub
217b1(mdo sde): sems dpa'i sprul pa ni// pad+ma 'dang ma stong pa la/ dkyil mo krung bcas 'dug pa dag/ zhing nas zhing du 'gro bar byed/ ting 'dzim zhi pa bsgoms nas ni/ gzugs dang mdzo /
217b2(mdo sde): bzang po dang // mdo sde gzhan yang bye ba dang / sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu ston// sems can mang po bsam mi khyab// phyir mi ldog pa 'god par byed// sangs rgyas byang chub rab
217b3(mdo sde): ston kyang // spobs pa dag ni zad mi 'gyur// rin chen rnam par brgyan pa yi// khang pa brtsegs zhugs de 'gro ste// dri dang ldan pa'i me tog gis// 'dren pa la yang mngon par
217b4(mdo sde): mthor// dri dang ldan pa'i phye mas kyang // 'dren pa la ni rab tu mthor// de dag thams cad byang chub phyir// rgya che ba yi mchod pa byed// byang chub sems dpa' skyob pa yi
217b5(mdo sde): yon tan dpag med de dag ni// nam zhig nyon mongs med gyur pa// de tshe rdzu 'phrul de dag 'thob// nyon mongs dag ni mi skye zhing // dag pa dang ba 'od gsal ba// mi 'khrugs 'dus
217b6(mdo sde): ma byas pa ni// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul lo// rab tu zhi zhing nye bar zhi// nyon mongs med cing mya ngan bral// spros med rnam par ma spros pa// spros pa dag las shin tu 'das/
217b7(mdo sde): yi ge'i spyod pa med pa ni// chos rnams kun gyi mtshan nyid de// dbyangs kyis rig par dka' bas na// de phyir ting nge 'dzin ces bya// zad mi shes shing nye bar zhi// lhun gyis 'grub
218a1(mdo sde): cing bstan med pa/ rnyog med yang dag nyid kyi mtha'// sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod yul lo// 'ong dang 'gro ba med pa dang / spros med lhun gyis grub pa yi
218a2(mdo sde): chos rnams kun gyis rang bzhin ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi bslab pa ste/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'di bsrabs nas/ yon tan dag gi pha rol phyin/ tshu rol dang ni pha rol med/
218a3(mdo sde): mtha' rnam par ma brtags te// de phyir sangs rgyas de dag kun// yon tan dag gi pha rol phyin// 'od dang 'gro ba med pa dang / spos med lhun gyis 'grub pa yi/ chos kyi
218a4(mdo sde): rang bzhin mkhyen nas ni// de dag de las pha rol phyin// ting nge 'dzin nges par bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// / 'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal
218a5(mdo sde): po'i mdo// bam po lnga pa/ de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la
218a6(mdo sde): gtsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba re logs su thal mo sku rab btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di skar bcom ldan 'das
218a7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dam bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bslab pa'i ting nge
218b1(mdo sde): bstan pa legs par bshad pa ni ngo mtshar to// 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis yun ring por bslab pa 'di la bsrabs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag
218b2(mdo sde): par bsgrubs pa ni bcom ldan 'das bdag spobs so// bde bar gshegs pa bdag spobs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gzhon nu de'i dus la dbab par shes na khyod
218b3(mdo sde): spobs par gyis shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la skabs phye nas bcom ldan 'das la mngon sum du tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis
218b4(mdo sde): bstod do// 'dod dang khro ba'i rtag tu zil non cing // sdug bsngal gtses pa'i sems can gzigs nas ni// skye dgu thar byed sangs rgyas gyur cig ces// byang chub phyir ni khyod kyis sems
218b5(mdo sde): kyang bskyed// dpa' bos bsal pa bye ba mang spyad de// sbyin dang dul dang legs sdom rtag tu gnas// bzod drang tshul khrims de bzhin brtson 'grus des// sbyin pa dag kyang mtha' yas
218b6(mdo sde): rgya cher byin// rkang lag dang ni srog kyang rab gtong zhing // khyod kyi yid la nam yang skyon med de// gser dngul de bzhin bu dang chung ma dang // chags med gyur nas rgyal po'i srid kyang gtong //
218b7(mdo sde): khyod kyi tshul khrims dri med rnam dag ste// bdag nyid gtong zhing tshul khrims yong mi 'dral// lus dang ngag dang yid kyang rab tu bsdams// bder gshegs sems dul khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//
219a1(mdo sde): bzod la dgyes shing bzod pa'i lam la gnas/ lus ni dum bur byas kyang 'khrugs med de/ byams pa bsgoms pas de las 'o ma zags/ bder gshegs
219a2(mdo sde): ngo mtshar khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// stobs bcu dag gi stobs dang ldan gyur cing // chags med ye shes gnas pas chos kun rtogs// thugs rjes 'jig rten phan mdzad chos kyi rje// skye dgu/
219a3(mdo sde): 'di yi don bzhed thugs brtse ba// stong par mkhyen cing 'di na sems can med// de bzhin 'jig rten lam stor gzigs nas ni// de dag rang bzhin bdag med chos rtogs bgyis// rnam//
219a4(mdo sde): grol skyes kyang gang na'ang rnam grol med// so sor rtogs te bag med thams cad spangs// bdud sde mtha' yas stobs dang ldan pa bcom// ye shes mtha' yas byang chub rgya cher mkhyen
219a5(mdo sde): mchog tu rnam par zhi ba'i chos kyang ston// zla ba skar mar bcas pa'i gnam lhung zhing // ri dang grong du bcas pa'i sa gzhigs la// nam mkha'i khams ni rnam par gzhan gyur kyang // khyod
219a6(mdo sde): ni bden pa yi tshogs mi gsung // skye dgu dmigs pa dag la dga' ba dang // sems can sdug bsngal khyod kyis gzigs nas ni// stong pa nyid dang zab cing zhi ba yi// dmigs pa med pa dag ni
219a7(mdo sde): ston par mdzad// bskal pa bye ba bsam yas su// mi dmigs pa yi bslab pa la// dpa' bo chen pos bslabs pas na// khyod la 'khrul pa yod mi mnga'// ji lta bu yi chos bslabs pa/
219b1(mdo sde): de lta bu yi chos ston te// mu stegs gzhan dag ji snyed dang // byis pa dag gis 'di min// bdag tu 'du shes gang gnas pa/ mi mkhas de dag 'khrul par 'gyur// chos rnams bdag med
219b2(mdo sde): rig pas na/ khyod la 'khrul pa yong mi mnga'// dpa' bo chen po yang dag gsungs// yang dag chos la rab tu gnas/ mgon po yang dag bden gnas te/ yang dag tshig ni rab tu gsung /
219b3(mdo sde): khyod kyis sngon lam btab pa bzhin// khyod kyi yang dag spyor pa byung // yang dag de yi rgyu 'drabs/ yang dag tshig ni rab tu gsung // yang dag sbyong ba phun sum tshogs/ yang dag
219b4(mdo sde): mtha' la shin tu bslabs// yang dag bsam pa yang dag spyod// yang dag mkhyen la phyag 'tshal lo// khyod kyi shes rab mnyam pa med// ye shes gsung ba 'ong mdzad pa/ ye shes
219b5(mdo sde): khyad par rab bsres shing // ye shes gsung sa phyag 'tshal lo// khyod kyis byams pa rab bsgoms te// sems can kun gyi ba shes gnyen spyod// ri rab bzhin du mi skul te// mi g.yorab tu
219b6(mdo sde): gnas pa'o// sbyin pa'i 'khor tshogs rgya che yang / tshogs rnams dag kyang sdang ba mdzad// shes rab zab mo bde bar gshegs// 'khor gyi nang gshegs sgra yang ldog/ sangs rgyas
219b7(mdo sde): ge'i sgra spogs shing // seng ge'i skabs su rnam par gshegs// khyod kyis bri stegs kun 'atul ba// seng ge yis ni la rnams bzhin// dpa' bo ma dul dul mdzad pa/ gas dul pa
220a1(mdo sde): dag khyod kyis btul// de dag mdza' sdug brtan gyur te/ dbyer mi phyed cing legs par gnas// lta ba sna tshogs gnas pa yi// sems can sdug bsngal gzigs nas/
220a2(mdo sde): ni// sdug dang mi sdug med pa yi// bdag med chos ni khyod ston te/ ma bslabs pa mi byis pa dag/ log pa'i lam la spyod pa rnams// 'dzin pa gang nas gshegs pa yi// lam
220a3(mdo sde): yang khyod kyis rab tu bstan// bdag tu 'dzin la su gnas pa// de dag sdug bsngal nyid la gnas// gang la sdug bsngal med pa yi// bdag med de dag mi shes so// 'khrul pa med pa'i
220a4(mdo sde): chos tshig khyod ston te// khyod la 'khrul pa mi rnyed 'jig rten mgon// khyod ni ma log pa yi tshig gsung ste// sdug bsngal mang bar mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// lha klu gnod sbyin bye ba khrag
220a5(mdo sde): khrig phrag/ brgya stong mang po mkha' la 'khod pa rnams// bcom ldan 'das kyi don ldan gsung thos nas// thams cad 'dren la rab tu dga' ba skyes// tshig ni rab tu snyan cing bzang la
220a6(mdo sde): 'tha'// mnyen zhing 'jam la yid 'ong dus dang 'byor// gsung gi yan lag dpag tu med dang ldan// phan byed skye bo mang po thar byed pa// sil snyan brgya stong dpag tu med pa dang // lha yi
220a7(mdo sde): dbyangs sgra dga' bar 'gyur ba'i mchog/ shin tu snyan pa dus cig 'byor gyur kyang // bde gshegs gsung cig gis ni zil gyis non// khu byu ga bya mang 'jam pa'i sgra 'byin dang / ku
220b1(mdo sde): nal shin tu yid 'thad dbyangs snyan dag/ bya tshogs mang po thams cad sla 'byin pa/ sangs rgyas gsung gi char yang des mi phod// lha yi bu mo sla dbyangs snyan pa dag sil snyam rob
220b2(mdo sde): mo glu dbyangs 'jam pa dang / pi wang rdza rnga rnga chen dung gi sgra/ de dag sangs rgyas gsung gi char mi phod// khu byug ne tso ri skegs sgra rnams dang // khrung khrung rma bya mi 'am ci yi swa/ sgra
220b3(mdo sde): dbyangs yid 'ong snyan pa ci yod pa// de dag sangs rgyas gsung gi char mi phod// snyan cing mnyen la yid 'ong dga' ba dang / shin tu mnyen la rab bsngags zhi ba'i tshig/ dbyangs rnams
220b4(mdo sde): thams cad dus gcig bsgrags pa bas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung mchog dgar gyur yin// lha mi mi dbang lha mi yin rnams dang // srid gsum sems can mtha' dag ci yod pa/
220b5(mdo sde): 'od byed rnams kyi 'od snang de dag ni// bde gshegs 'od zer gcig gis zil gyis gnon// bde gshegs sku ni me tog rgyas pa bzhin// mtshan rnams kun gyis sna tshogs spras shing brgyan/
220b6(mdo sde): bsod nams rgyas 'grub dag cing rnam par dang // rgyal ba'i sku ni 'jig rten kun tu ldan// dung gi sgra dang 'khor rnga sgra stan dang / rnga'i sna de bzhin kim pa la yi snga/ rab tu
220b7(mdo sde): 'jam zhing 'thad pa'i sgra de kun// sangs rgyas dbyangs kyi brgya yi char mi phod// sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig stong gi sgra// sgra skad gsal zhing mnyen pa lha yi 'dra// lha dang lha mo'i sgra
221a1(mdo sde): dbyangs dgar 'gyur ba/ sangs rgyas dbyangs kyi brgya yi char mi phod/ khrung khrung cha ba ngur ba khu byug dang / ngang ba kun la rnam mang bya yi tshogs de dag sna
221a2(mdo sde): gnyen dus gcig tshogs pas kyang // sangs rgyas dbyangs kyi brgya yi char mi phod/ klu dang gnod sbyin lha min lto 'phye dang // lha dbang tshangs pa lha yi bdag po'i sgra/ srid gsum
221a3(mdo sde): yid 'ong 'dzad pa ci yod pa// de dag sangs rgyas dbyangs kyi char mi phod// tshangs pa'i 'od dang lha yi dbang po dang // nyi ma dang ni nor bu rin chen 'ong // kun gyi 'od ni rnam pa du ma dag
221a4(mdo sde): 'od kun rgyal po'i 'od kyis zil gyi non// lus dang ngag dang yid kyang shin tu rnam par dag/ ye shes dag pa srid pa gsum na gos pa med/ mi dbang yon tan dbyig tshogs yon tan
221a5(mdo sde): rin chen mnga'// rang 'byung yon tan thams cad kyis ni mnyam med mnyam// de ltar stobs bcu bden pa gsung la bstod nas ni// gzhon nu yid kyang rab tu dga' bas tshig smras pa/
221a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas gzhal med dpag yas la ni mchod pa yis// shAkya thub bzhin bdag kyang sangs rgyas gyur cig snga// bde bar gshegs pa de yi spyod pa mchog mkhyen nas// mi
221a7(mdo sde): dbang chags med ye shes mnga' ba 'dzum pa mdzad// stobs bcu sras kyi thu bo byams pas de zhus te// 'dren pas gang gi slad du 'di ltar 'dzum pa mdzad// sa 'di dag kyang
221b1(mdo sde): rnam pa drug tu yongs su g.yos/ lha dang klu rnams mkha' la 'dug cing rab dga' ste/ shin tu sems rang mgubs sangs rgyas lta zhing mchis/ bde gshegs zil gyis mnon de
221b2(mdo sde): dag lung bstan gsol// skyes bu mchog gi ye shes gang la zhugs pa ni// bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dag gis ma lags/ rgyal ba khyod kyis gang gi slad du 'dzum mdzad pa/
221b3(mdo sde): shes rnam dag dpe med ye shes ma lus gsungs// shAkya'i seng ge stobs bcu mnga' zhing rnam 'dren pa/ rkang gnyis gtso bo ye shes kyi'ang pha rol phyin/ 'dod chags dang
221b4(mdo sde): ni zhe sdang tha ba gti mug sel// rab tu 'od snang mdzad pa khyod la zhu ba lags// byang chub dam pa mchog 'di rab tu tshol ba'i phyir/ 'dren pas bskal pa gang+gA yi ni byi snyed dang /
221b5(mdo sde): de la lhag par yang ni spyad pa rab tu spyad// gang gi don du 'dzum pa 'di mdzad bstan du gsol// ye shes dam pa mchog 'di rab tu tshol ba'i phyir// ston pas phyag dang zhabs kyang
221b6(mdo sde): yongs su gtang ba mdzad// sras dang btsun mo gnyen bshes rtsa lag phangs pa btang // thub pa 'dzum pa bstan pa 'di yi rgyu gang lags// rta dang ba glang dang ni shing rta rkang thang
221b7(mdo sde): dang / bran dang nor bung ngul dang mu tig khyod kyis btang // spyod pa mchog spyod tshe ni khyod kyis ma btang ba// rin po che dang nor rdzas dag ni gang yang med// srid pa gsum na ye shes dag/
222a1(mdo sde): ni mchog tu gyur// sems can thams cad kyi ni spyod pa rab tu mkhyen// sems dang khams dang mos pa dag la'ang mkhas shing rig/ gang gi don du 'dzum pa'adzi/
222a2(mdo sde): dag bstan pa mdzad// mi yi gtso bo la ni gang gis mchod// gang gi don du rgya che yangs par 'gyur// spyod pa 'di yang su dag rab tu 'dzin// thub pa gang gi don du 'dzum 'di bstan/
222a3(mdo sde): sa yang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos// pad+ma bye ba 'dab ma bye bar ldan// gser gyi pad+ma shin tu 'od gsal ba// mdzes shing yid du 'thad pa sa las byung / byang chub sems dpa' rdzu/
222a4(mdo sde): 'phrul rab che ba// rgyal ba'i thugs kyi sras po de la mchis// chos smra ba yang mang po 'dir mchis te// 'dren pa la ni de yi slad du zhu// rnga dang dung dang khar rnga rnga chen dang // sil snyan bye
222a5(mdo sde): ba khrag khrig brdungs pa yi// de dag sgra ni nam mkha' 'di las gda'// bde bar gshegs pa'i dbyangs ni bsam mi khyab// khrung khrung ngang pa ka la bing+ka dang // khu byug bya tshogs mang po
222a6(mdo sde): 'dus pa yi// sgra dbyangs rab tu snyan pa byung ba yang // de dag sangs rgyas dbyangs kyi char mi phod// gang gis sbyin dang dul dang legs sdom rnams// sngon gyi bskul ba mang por bsnyen pa
222a7(mdo sde): bgyis// gang gis mi yi gtso bo rab mchod na// su yi slad du 'dzum pa 'di dag bstan// ri mo gus pa mchog kyang bskyed nas ni// sangs rgyas byang chub ji ltar thob 'gyur zhes// gang
222b1(mdo sde): gis nang gnyis gcol sngon chud nus/ su mi srad du 'dzum pa 'di dag bsam stobs bcu ldan pa ji snyed 'das pa dang // da myur byung dang mabyon bde gshegs dang / mi man ma
222b2(mdo sde): thams cad rab tu babyen// dpyir ste dbu'i don du zhu ba lags// srog chags kun gyi skrod yul mthu' las dang // mi rnams gang gi bas thob ci 'jadang // skyed bu'i sems kyi rgyang ga sa /
222b3(mdo sde): mkhyen// de phyi me yi gtso bo zhu ba lags// rgyu dang rigs pa 'dul la mkhas padag/ sangs rgyas ye shes ji ltar thob snyam pa// spyong ba mchogs su dag sbyong ba rnams// de phyir bdag ni
222b4(mdo sde): gnyis gtso boru// gang gis phra zhing shin tu bsdu dka'i chos/ stong pazhi pa mtshungs med bsam mi khyab// stobs bcu ldan pa'i spyod yul bsgom pa rnams// de dag srad du 'dron pa bdag
222b5(mdo sde): nu'o// srog chags 'gro ba bsam yas kun gyi phyir// gang gis byams sam snying rje rab bsgom shing // gang la sems can 'du shes med pa dag/ de phyir rkang gnyis gcol bdag zhu'o//
222b6(mdo sde): gang dag ye shes mtshungs med bsam mi khyab// de dag la ni gzung ba yong med de// sems dang spyod yul dag gi pha rol phyin// de phyir mgon po la ni bdag zhu'o// tshul khrims ye shes
222b7(mdo sde): yon tan pha rol phyin// dus gsum la ni ye shes mtshungs med 'jug khyod la 'khrul pa dag ni mi mnga' na// su yi slad du 'dzum pa 'di dag bstan// shA ri'i bu dang ma 'gags mo'u
223a1(mdo sde): 'gal bu// bde gshegs nyan thos gzhan gang su mchis pa// 'di la de dag ye shes mi 'jug ste// 'di ni sangs rgyas spyod yul bla na med// chos rnams kun la
223a2(mdo sde): dbang ba'i pha rol phyin// bslab pa'i spyod pa kun gyis mngon par 'phags// 'dren pa thugs rje dag kyang rab bskyed la// don dam mkhyen pa gsung sna dbyung bar gsol// sngon gang bskal pa
223a3(mdo sde): bye ba mang por yang // skyabs dang dpung gnyen mchog tu gyur snyam ste// de 'dra'i sems kyis rkang gnyis gtso dris pa// 'dren pas de yi 'bras bu deng gsung shig/ gang bag chen pos lung
223a4(mdo sde): bstan mnyan pa'i phyir// gnod sbyin srin po grul bum gsang ba po// rkang gnyis gtso bo la ni rab rtog cing // thams cad thal mo sbyar te gus par 'khod// sangs rgyas zhing ni bye ba mang po nas/
223a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' 'phrul ldan mang po mchis// bde gshegs sras kyi gtso bo thugs las skyes// thams cad thal mo sbyar cing gus par 'khod// shAkya seng ge mi mchog dri ba'i phyir/
223a6(mdo sde): mi 'khrugs zhing phyogs 'jig rten rnam grags pa// shar phyogs nas ni spos kyi glang po yang // byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig mdun bdar mchis// shAkya seng ge mi mchog dri ba'i phyir//
223a7(mdo sde): bde ba can gyi 'jig rten khams mchog nas// mthu chen thob dang spyan ras gzigs dbang yang / byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig lhan cig mchis// gang dag sngan chad bskal pa bye mang
223b1(mdo sde): rgyab sa shes dam pa mchog 'angatshal ba'i grub rgyamatshobu kyi bye ma mnyam pa yi/ bdag shegs dpag tumed pa bsnyen pakun bgyis/ sangs sa su gyis pasngod cing rab bsngags pa
223b2(mdo sde): chos rnams kun gyi yon tan pha rol phyin// 'jig rten phyogs rnams kun tu rab grags pa// 'jam dbyangs legs par thal mo sbyar te mchis// sangs rgyas zhing du zag khrig spyang bgyis kyang / 'di
223b3(mdo sde): 'dra rnams ni mthong ba rnyed dka' ste// legs bslabs sangs rgyas sras po yon tan can// thams cad thal mo rab sbyar gus par 'khod// ston pa kun gyi chos kyi mdzod 'dzin pa/ mkhas
223b4(mdo sde): pa 'dir mchis ci 'dra lta bu// snod du gyur pa 'di na gzhan ma mchis// 'dren pa 'jam pa'i dbyangs su brjod pa gsungs/ rgyal ba rnam 'dren gleng gzhi ma mchis par/ gang zag med pa
223b5(mdo sde): 'dzum pa mi ston na// gang gi slad du 'dzum pa 'di bstan pa// rnga mchog sgra ldan gsung dbyangs 'byung du gsol// ngang pa khu phyag rma bya sa ra sa// 'brug gi sgra skad khyu mchog sgra 'byin bzhin/
223b6(mdo sde): sna yi rol mo snyan pa'i sgra 'byin pa// sems can grol mdzad gsung gis lung ston cig/ byams pa bskyed cing dga' ba 'phel bar bgyid// ye shes ston cing ma rig sel ba ste// don la /
223b7(mdo sde): cing shes rab 'phel bgyid cing // bskal pa khrag khrig bye bar rnam sbyor ba// rtogs pas nges bgyis dngos po rnam par ba shig/ sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i tshig don nges par ston/ mu sngags
224a1(mdo sde): kun gyi smra ba rnam par 'jom// stong pa srog med sems can med bsgom// bsod nams stong phrag brgya yis legs par brgyan// sangs rgyas stong phrag brgya yis
224a2(mdo sde): 'dir spyad de// lha rnams stong phrag brgya yis rab tu bstod// tshangs pa stong phrag brgya yis phyag kyang bgyis// gnod sbyin srin po grul bum dang bgyid de// klu dang lto 'phye 'dab bzangs
224a3(mdo sde): grol bar bgyid// rtag tu ma chags shin tu ldan pa ste// las dge'i 'bras bus 'phags pa gsung byang shig/ rtul ba ji snyed mya ngan 'das pa dang // gang dag ma byon pa dag bzhugs pa
224a4(mdo sde): rnams// thams cad khyod kyis mkhyen cing thogs mi mnga'// 'dzin pa yon tan kun gyis shin tu 'phags// 'byung po 'dzin pa ri dang rgya mtshor bcas// sa 'di thams cad rnam pa drug tu g.yos/
224a5(mdo sde): lha yi tshogs rnams mkha' las me tog 'thor// lha yi spos ngang yid du 'ong ba ldang // 'dod chags zhe sdang rab rib ma lus bsal// tshul khrims yongs dag yid kyang yongs su dag
224a6(mdo sde): mtshan med rab tu zhi ba'i stong la dgyes// song ge'i sgra skad spogs shig thugs rje can// spobs dang ldan ning shin tu snyan pa yangs// rgyal ba'i shes rab rdzogs shing ye shes rdzogs/
224a7(mdo sde): thugs rje ldan pa khyod 'dra 'jig rten med// gang gi don du 'dzum pa 'di bstan gsungs/ rma bya khu byug ka la birda'i sgra/ shang shang te'u yi sgra yang yid 'ong ba/ dgar 'gyur
224b1(mdo sde): na kun dris gcig tshogs pas kyang // bde gshegs gsung gi chur ni des mi phod/ dza dang rdza rma bar da de bzhin te// dung dang bring bu de bzhin pa lang dang / ses spyan stong gi sgra rnams
224b2(mdo sde): gcig tu 'dus/ de dag pa gshegs sgra mi ma ma phod// lha'i sim snyan ngas pa stong shes// lha yi bu mo gru dbyangs spyan po dang / rol mo'i bla rnams dga' ba sbeng bgying pa/ de dag
224b3(mdo sde): bde gshegs gsung gi char mi pod// 'jig rten phan pa khyod kyi gsung gcig las// mos pa tha dang bzhin du sme 'byung ste// rgyal ba bdag la ston skams so sems/ gang gi srad du
224b4(mdo sde): khyod kyis 'dzum mdzad sngon// lha yi sgra dang de bzhin gru yi skad/ mi 'am ci yi sgra snyan ci mchis pa// de dag nam yang nyon mongs zhi mi bgyid// sangs rgyas gsung ni rtag tu nyon mongs
224b5(mdo sde): sem// dga' ba skyed cing 'dod chags dga' ma lags// byams pa skyed cing zhe sdang blo ma lags// shes rab skyed cing gti mug blo ma lags/ sangs rgyas gsung gis dri ma
224b6(mdo sde): thams cad sel// 'khor las srad rol tu ni sgra mi 'byung // thams cad kyi yang nem nur brgya mang gcod// mtho ba ma lags dma' ba ma lags pa/ thub pa'i gsung ni
224b7(mdo sde): snyoms shing bde ba ston// ri dang nags bcas sa 'jigs gyur cing // rgya mtsho'i chu dag de bzhin gas gyur la// zla ba nyi mas la lhung gyur kyang // rgyal bas bshad pa rnam pa gzhan
225a1(mdo sde): mi 'gyur// tshig gi yan lag thams cad dag pa'i gsung // seng ge'i sgra skad 'jam zhing mnyen pa'i dbyangs/ tshangs pa'i dbyangs mnga' bde gshegs thugs rje
225a2(mdo sde): can// gang gi slad du 'dzum mdzad bstan du gsol// 'das dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar gyi// 'jig rten sems can ji snyed kun gyi yang // sems dang spyod pa kun pa rab tu mkhas/
225a3(mdo sde): gang gi srad du 'dzum bstan bshad du gsol/ rgyal ba ji snyed su dag thugs rje can// dbang dang ye shes kun gyi pha rol phyin// dri med zla zhal rgyal ba de dag ni/ rtag tu rgyu med
225a4(mdo sde): 'dzum pa mi mdzad do// bskal pa bye bar brjod kyang mtshungs med pa// gang+gA'i bye snyed yon tan brjod bgyis kyang // yon tan dag gi tshad brjod mi rus pa/ gang gi slad du 'dzum
225a5(mdo sde): bstan bshad du gsol// 'dzum pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// // de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis// byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la mthun
225a6(mdo sde): ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis slar bka' stsal pa/ zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa 'di nyid kyis/ mtshungs pa med pa'i dga' bas sangs rgyas bstod/ sangs rgyas yon tan
225a7(mdo sde): bye brag 'phags brjod pas// rtag tu khor mor shin tu bsngags par 'gyur// sngon yang rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer 'dir// sangs rgyas dag kyang bye ba phrag stong mthong / rgyal ba de
225b1(mdo sde): dag kun gyi drung du 'dis// ting 'dzin zhi mchog 'di yang rab tu dris// byang chub spyod pa mchog 'di spyod pa na// 'di ni kun tu nga yi bur gyur te/ thams cad du yang spobs dang ldan par
225b2(mdo sde): gyur// kun tu rtag par tshangs par spor pa spyad// deni gyi dus 'jigs pa chen po la/ 'dil ma pa ma khyod nyi nga yi dbang // rtag tu tshangs spyod gtsang ma gnas nas ni// ting nge 'dzin shin
225b3(mdo sde): hU~Mn+yAm byer 'gyur// ting nge 'dzin rnam pa'i di ni 'tshol zhing // mas 'dir zhugs pas byang chub nges thob 'gyur// sangs rgyas bye ba ma mas yongs bzang ste/ 'dzin pa rnams la
225b4(mdo sde): mchod pa mchog byed 'gyur// nga ni ye shes la yang rab gnas te/ za 'od spyod pa khyad zhugs lung bstan cing // 'di yi srog dang tshangs par sbyor ba dag/ phyi ma'i dus la bar chad med
225b5(mdo sde): par bya// lag mthil sku ru 'bru lnga bkod pa bzhin// ma 'ongs pa na gang sa mchod 'gyur ba/ sangs rgyas bye ba dag ni phrag stong dang // de las lhag par gA d+hA'i bye snyed shes/
225b6(mdo sde): dang bu rnams bye ba brgyad cu da // gnod sbyin bye ba stong phrag bdun cu dang // phyi ma'i dus la brtson pa byed par 'gyur// rkang gnyis gtso bo la yang mchod pa byed// rkang gnyis gtsol
225b7(mdo sde): mchod pa mchog byas te// ye shes bla med 'di ni rab bsgrubs nas// phyi dus lus la de ni 'jig rten mgon// rgyal ba dri med 'od ces bya bar 'gyur// zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas
226a1(mdo sde): bdag nyid kyi// lung bstan 'di thos dga' bas rgyas gyur te// ta la bdun srid du ni mngon 'phags nas// mkha' la 'dug ste ched du brjod pa brjod// e
226a2(mdo sde): ma rgyal ba chos mchog ston mdzad pa// rnam grol ye shes bdag po stobs la gnas// shin tu nges pa'i ye shes mchog gnas pa// pha rol rgol ba dag gis zil mi non// chags pa spangs shing
226a3(mdo sde): rnam par grol la reg/ dngos po rnam bshig srid par chags mi mdzad// khyod la spros pa mtha' dag kun mi mnga'// srid pa gsum la chags med ye shes 'jug/ spros pa thams cad kyis kyang mi
226a4(mdo sde): gos shing // lta ba spros pa mtha' dag rab tu spangs// lam yang shin tu bsgoms shing gnas med pa// zil gyis ma non su dang mi 'phrod med// khyod ni khams gsum dag la gnas med de// chu bo dang //
226a5(mdo sde): ni mdud pa thams cad spangs// sred pa'i khri shing 'ching ba mtha' dag bcad// skyid pa spangs shing srid par mtshams sbyor med// chos kyi rang bzhin dngos med rab mkhyen cing // brjod du
226a6(mdo sde): med pa'i tshigs kyang thugs su chud// mu stegs phyin ci lo ka la gnas pa dag/ mi mkhas de kun seng ges wa bzhin bshika/ bde bar gshegs pas bstan pa'i chos kyi gter// gter/
226a7(mdo sde): mchog dam pa bdag gis deng 'thob ste// ngan 'gro log par ltung ba thams cad spangs// 'dzin par mi 'gyur snyam du the tsom med// gser gyi kha dog mdzes shing 'od gsal ba// phyag kyang
226b1(mdo sde): de yi mgo la rab bzhag nas// lhar bcas 'jig rten dag kyang dbang bkod de// mi yi khyu mchog byang chub dbang bskur mdzad// 'dzum pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//
226b2(mdo sde): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa// gzhon nu de lta bas ni// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos// sems can thams
226b3(mdo sde): cad srid pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad las thar bar bya bar 'dod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dga' zhing bde ba bla na med pa// 'phags pa 'di la sems can rnams rab tu dgod par 'dod pas
226b4(mdo sde): chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po 'di mnyan par bya// gzung bar bya/ kun chub par bya/ bcang bar bya/ bklags par bya/ rab tu gdon par
226b5(mdo sde): bya lung gnod par bya/ kha ton bya/ nyon mongs pa med pa'i bsgoms bsgom par bya/ mang du bya/ gzhan la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
226b6(mdo sde): gnon nu chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po 'di ni ngan song thams cad las 'da' bar byed pa/ nad thams cad las rab tu thar bar byed pa yin
226b7(mdo sde): te gzhon nu nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po 'di thos shing bzung ste// bsgoms par
227a1(mdo sde): gyur pa de'i tshe/ gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can thams cad srid pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad las thar bar byas shing ting nge 'dzin gyi dga'
227a2(mdo sde): ba'i bde ba bla na med pa 'phags pa la sems can rnams rab tu 'god de/ ting nge 'dzin 'di yang myur du 'thob bo// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang myur du mngon par rdzogs
227a3(mdo sde): par 'tshangs rgya'o// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la don 'di nyid bstan pa'i phyir// tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis sngon byung ba'i gtam
227a4(mdo sde): bstan pa 'di yang dag par rab tu bshad do// sngon chad spyod pa spyad pa dran pa ni// bde gshegs seng ge rgyal mtshan bstan pa la// dge slong mkhas pa chos smra byung ba yang // de yi ming ni tshangs pas/
227a5(mdo sde): byin zhes bya// nga ni blo gros zhes bya rgyal po'i bu// na bar gyur te mi bzang sdug bsngal tshor// de tshe tshangs pas byin pa chos smra ba// nga yi slob dpon du ni gyur pa yin// nga yi sman pa lnga brgya mi cung
227a6(mdo sde): ba brtson pa'i yid kyis nad dpyad gso ba byed// nga yi nang ni gso bar ma nus nas// nga yi gnyen bshes kun kyang sdug bsngal 'gyur// nga yang na bar dge slong des thos nas// nang
227a7(mdo sde): 'dri bar ni nga yi drung du 'ongs// tshangs byin nga la rtse ba rab bskyed nas// ting 'dzin mchog 'di de tshe bshad par gyur// da ni ting 'dzin dam pa 'di thos nas// 'phags pa'i dga' bzang /
227b1(mdo sde): zing med pa skyes// chos kyi ngo bo nyid kyang rab shes pas/ gang yang de yi dus na nad las sos// mar me mdzad ni spyad pa spyod pa na// dge slong chos smra mkhas par gyur pa yin/
227b2(mdo sde): blo gros rgyal po'i bur gyur te/ ting 'dzin ye shes kyis ni nad las thar de bas gzhon nu khyod kyis byi dus na// yongs su nyams pa 'di dag rjes rngan cing / byis pas nyes par brjod/
227b3(mdo sde): pa'i tshig bzod kyis// ting 'dzin 'di yang zung la legs par lhogs// phyi ma'i dus la dge slong mang po dag/ brkam zhing gtum la ma bsdams 'byung bar 'gyur// sdig pa dga'
227b4(mdo sde): zhing lhung bzed chos gos chags// ting 'dzin 'di ni rab tu spong bar 'gyur// rgod cing dbang po g.yengs pa phrag dog can// grong la chags shing rnyed pa 'dod pa dag/ sbyor ba byed pa'i
227b5(mdo sde): skabs la rtag tu gnas// ting 'dzin 'di ni rab tu spong bar 'gyur// lag pa dang ni rkang pa rnam par rdzob// rtse 'jo dgod la rtag par rab tu zhugs// gcig la gcig ni mgul
227b6(mdo sde): 'khyud lags kyang spel// grong du spyod lam gzhan du sbyar bar byed// mi rigs sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid 'di dag ste// gzhan gyi bu mo la yang rtag tu chags// gzugs kyis rgyags shing
227b7(mdo sde): 'dud pa bor ba yin// grong dang grong khyer yul 'khor kun tu rgyu// de dag bza' dang btung la rab tu zhugs// glu dang gro gar de bzhin rol mo dang // nyo 'tshong lhag par byed cing rtag tu brtson//
228a1(mdo sde): btung ba dag la chags shing ngo tsha bor// mi rigs brtson pa spring yig skur bar byed// tshul khrims de bzhin spyod lam btang nas ni/ khyim pa dag dang bsten cing
228a2(mdo sde): khrims dral nas// de dag tshul zhig log par shin tu gnas// las gang sangs rgyas kyis ni rtage smar pa// srang dang tshad la g.yo sgyu byed par zhugs// de 'ja'i sdig pa nyon mongs las byas/
228a3(mdo sde): pas// las ngar byed pa de dag ngan song 'gro// rung dang gser dang nor bu nor mang dang // khyim dang gnyen bshes rnam spangs rab byung ste// sangs rgyas bstan pa 'di la rab byung nas// sdig pa'i las
228a4(mdo sde): rnams shin tu spyod par byed// nor dang 'bru la snying por 'du shes shing // gzhon dang ba lang shing rta rnams la chags// gang la bsrabs pa'i nan tan med pa rnams// de dag gis kyang ci phyir mgo bo bregs//
228a5(mdo sde): ngas ni sngon tshe spyod pa spyad pa na// bskal pa stong du shin tu dka' spyad de// nga yi ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di btsal na// de dag de tshe 'di thos gad mo'i 'debs// de dag yun ring brdzun smra tshangs mi spyod// rtag
228a6(mdo sde): tu rnyed la dga' zhing ngan song gzhol// tshangs par spyod pa'i rgyal mtshan thogs nas ni// tshul khrims 'chal pa de ni chos mi smra// de dag phan tshun dbye ba'i phyir 'jug ste// rigs pa ma yin pas ni rnyed pa
228a7(mdo sde): tshol// gcig la gcig ni mi snyan rab brjod de// shi 'phos nas ni ngan song sar yang 'gro// de dag brgya dang stong gi nang na yang // re tshe bzod pa'i stobs ldan shin tu dkon// de phyir 'thab la brtson pa
228b1(mdo sde): nga byung / mthod pa bya su ba tu thos pazas kyang chub mams dpa' des mi tshig tu ste// sa sgra yang phyogs dang phyogs sgyu gro// ya des na marnags pas nas
228b2(mdo sde): tshus drim sernams sa byang chub ga la yod/ gagang la bsam pa rnam par dag med cing/ gachos 'dis yang 'azod pa med pa dang // chos rnams spong byed byang chub 'ang thob pa// ngas nim thos nam
228b3(mdo sde): ming mod ma mthong // de dag 'jigs shing sngag nas khyim sbyangs te// rab tu byung nas shin tu ngam du 'dzin// skyes bu dam pa'i theg pa spangs byas nas/ bye brag lhag par 'dod par 'dzag par 'gyur/
228b4(mdo sde): shes rab dman zhing yon tan rnam spangs pa// theg pa mchog gi nyes pa rtag tu brjod// gang gi skyabs su de dag rab zhugs pa// de nyid la'ang nyes pa brgya dag brjod// 'tshob med pa mang po rab byung ste/
228b5(mdo sde): sas rgas kyang chu rnam pa ma 'byod / bris pa das badrug tustsas gnas/ stor macid na thos nas skrag par 'gyur/ lamatshun du 'a rtsod pa byas nas ni// mnong sems pang po phyi
228b6(mdo sde): skyed// phan tshun du'ang bskur ba mngon 'debs shing // sdig pa byas nas shin tu dga' ba rnyed// gang dag tshul khrims gnas shing yon tan ldan// byams la gnas shing rtag tu bzod rtogs
228b7(mdo sde): ba gnyen zhing nges la shin tu bsdams pa rnams// de dag re tshe yongs su brnyas par 'gyur// gang yang shin tu gtum sems ldan 'byung dang // mi bzang ma rungs ngan pa'i las byed pa/
229a1(mdo sde): chos ma yin pa spyod cing 'thab la dga'// de dag de yi dus na mchod par 'gyur// bsgo bar bya zhing rab tu go bar bya// gzhon nung la dad pa'i phyir 'brang na/ bde bar
229a2(mdo sde): gshegs pas bstan pa 'di dran nas// de dag la ni nam yang yid mi ston// de dag 'dod chags che zhing zhe sdang re// gti mug che zhing nga rgyal dregs pas rgyags// lus kyang ma dul dag kyangs
229a3(mdo sde): dul zhing // sems kyang ma dul ngan song gzhol ba yin// nga ni yon tan dag gi bsngags brjod na// dge slong yon tan dgal me spyod de/ tshig cam gyis ni byang chub thob mi 'gyur/ nan tan
229a4(mdo sde): lhur byed byang chub rmed mi dka'// sngon byung ba'i le'u sde bcu drug pa'o// / de nas gtam 'di mthar phyin par gyur pa dang / de'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
229a5(mdo sde): chen po rnams pa'i sngar 'jug bzhin du// bcom ldan 'das la yid kyi tshigs su bcad pas nus pa// ri'i rnal po bu mo dpung ba ci// rtag tu sangs rgyas gnas par bde gshegs badz+rad
229a6(mdo sde): 'jig rten sngon ma der yang gshegs nas ni/ khyod la bsan gyis mi khyab mchod par bgyi// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams pa
229a7(mdo sde): tog pa thugs kyis mkhyemams/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen ma byams pa ma mi kyis tshams su bcad pas btang ba/ ri mi rgyal po rtsam par mngon garnas pa
229b1(mdo sde): badrung rnams pas thas myong song shig/ ringani 'gro bkun gyi don chen mang / blan med pa sgyur du grub par 'gyur/ de nas kyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams pa bcom ldan 'das/
229b2(mdo sde): kyis med kyis tshigs su bcad pas btang ba dang // bcom ldan 'das la yid kyis phyag 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das la yid kyis lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ 'khor de nas byung ste/ sa
229b3(mdo sde): rgyas su med pa rgya mtsho'i bye ma snyed kyi gnas ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po mchod rten chen po gang na yod pa der song ste phyin nas 'di lnga ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yongs su longs spyang po'i phyir
229b4(mdo sde): mo la/ ri'i rgyal po b+ha rgod kyi phung po mnyam zhing yang pa rgya che ba/ sdong dum dang / tshor ma dang rdo dang / gseg ma dang gyo mo dag med cing khor khor yug kun rin po che sna bdun du byin gyis
229b5(mdo sde): brlabs te/ sa gzhi rin po che an+d+ra nI la 'bar ba bsam gyis mi khyab la dpe med pa'i lha'i rgyan thams cad dang rin po ches rgyun pa rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs grangs med pa du ma'i bkod
229b6(mdo sde): bas rab tu spras pa dga' ldan ris kyi lha'i na bzas khyim gyi nyen 'khor brgyan cing spud de/ bdug spos kyi snod sna tshogs nas ni bdug pa 'thul bar byas phreng ba dang lnga ldis
229b7(mdo sde): ni brgyan me tog sna tshogs ni bkram lha'i rol mo'i sgra dbyangs ni bsgrags rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang lhab lhub bsgreng bas ni gang khyams kyi dkyil 'khor du ni bla re bres
230a1(mdo sde): 'khor gyi khyams kyi dbus su rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i lha'i ser ge'i khri mngon par sprul te/ rgya spun las ma byas pa'i gos ni bting ka tsa lin+da lhar 'jam
230a2(mdo sde): zhing re ga na bde ba dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i na bzas ni g.yogs steng du snying po be ga tsher ni bting snam rten mtha' gnyis dmar po ni bshams/ chu zhengs dang 'phang du dpag tshad tsam
230a3(mdo sde): yod pa btsugs te/ zhabs rten ni lha dang mi las 'das pa/ 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser las byas pa mu tig gi dra bas g.yogs pa/ ras rin po che bcos bus g.yogs pa/ seng ge'i
230a4(mdo sde): khri la brtags pa'i lha'i rin po che'i dril bu las ni sgra 'jam zhing yid du 'ongs pa gsal ba 'byung / phyogs kun tu ni nor bu rin po che chen po snang bar 'gyur/ rin po che'i gdugs chen po rtsa ba ni bai DUR+Ya
230a5(mdo sde): dri ma med pa'i rin po che chen po las byas par mngon par sprul to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po khor yug dang bcas pa thams cad
230a6(mdo sde): rin po che sna tshogs du ma'i bkod pa rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pas brgyan pa mngon par sprul nas/ skad cig de nyid la rdza 'od gzhon nur gyur pa'i khyim du zhugs par gyur to// zhugs nas bcom
230a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das la yid kyis phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la yid kyis lan gsum bskor ba byas nas stan la 'dug go// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ ri yang lha rdzas yang shing rgya che ba/
230b1(mdo sde): rkyen ma bangs mangs zhing dga' ba dang / bsam gyis mi byab lha rdzas med kyi khyams dbus su mchen seng ge'i khri yang btsugs/ lha rdzas gdugs las ming 'ong sgyu 'byung zhing / phyogs su nor sa/
230b2(mdo sde): na chen 'o nar 'byung // rtsa ba med du 'thad pa'i banAng/ a mam rgyal pa'i sras pos de gyur skul// ri yang rim chem sna tshogs rnam par bal rin chen ga nam chog kyang zags chang tsam du
230b3(mdo sde): rnams pa dpa'i bas de dag rab sprul nas/ ang cig cid la mi khyim du zhugs/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor chen po rgya mtsho la bu la chos kyi gtam yang dag par bstan te
230b4(mdo sde): yang dag par gzeng bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byas/ yangag par btsud de/ gangan las bzhengs nas gshegs so// de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis rgyal po'i kha
230b5(mdo sde): kyis zong byer chen po'i chu rngon gyi sgor byang nas/ ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po gang na yod pa der gshegs te byon pa dang byams pas sprul pa'i khyams gang na med pa der gshegs te
230b6(mdo sde): byon nas byams pas mngon par sprul pa'i seng ge'i khri chen po la bzhugs te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis ni yongs su bskor cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun gyis ni mdun gyis bltas/
230b7(mdo sde): lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / drang srong dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pas ni phyag byas te
231a1(mdo sde): 'khor rgya mtsho lta bu'i nang na chos ston to// de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa sog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong thams cad lhar gyur pa rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi khams
231a2(mdo sde): gzhan nas lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khrag khrig mang po dang lhan cig tu me tog dang / bdug spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / rol mo ni byed pheg ni
231a3(mdo sde): rdob/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i ba dan ni bsgreng/ phreng ba chen po dbul ba ni thogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen
231a4(mdo sde): po zhi ba'i sgo nas byung ste/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i rig na yod pa dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan
231a5(mdo sde): 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan
231a6(mdo sde): dang sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pas mchod pa chen po byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gus pa dang ldan ri mo dang ldan par chos dri ba'i phyir phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang
231a7(mdo sde): 'od gzhon nur gyur pa pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su bral mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te nu
231b1(mdo sde): nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i srad du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ bdag phyogs 'da' zhig nu'o// de yang /
231b2(mdo sde): ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gnon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gzhon nu de bzhin gshegs pas rtag tu khyod la skabs phyes de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
231b3(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig/ de skad ces bka' stsal te/ go skabs phye nas/ bcom ldan 'das la zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces
231b4(mdo sde): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos du dang ldan na chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par 'gyur/
231b5(mdo sde): de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gzhon nu chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos
231b6(mdo sde): thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob par 'gyur ro// gzhi gang zhe na/ gzhon nu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des shing 'grogs na/
231b7(mdo sde): bde ba yin/ dul zhing dul ba'i sa thob pa yin te/ de la pha rol gyis gshegs sam/ spros pa'i tshi ga nyes par smra zhing / nyes par brjod pa'i tshig gi lam bzod cing mi 'jed pa'i rang bzhin
232a1(mdo sde): can yin/ las la lta zhing nga rgyal bcom pa dang chos 'dod pa yin te/ gzhon nu chos dang po 'di dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ting nge 'dzin
232a2(mdo sde): 'di thob par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin/ tshul khrims yongs su dag cing tshul khrims ma zhig pa dang / tshul khrims/
232a3(mdo sde): la skyon med pa dang / tshul khrims 'dren ma ma yin pa dang / tshul khrims su srer ma gyur pa dang / tshul khrims mnyams pa dang / tshul khrims mi gnas pa dang / tshul khrims ma 'bags pa
232a4(mdo sde): dang / tshul khrims mi dmigs pa dang / 'phags pas bstod pa'i tshul khrims dang / mkhas pas bstod pa'i tshul khrims pa yin te/ gzhon nu chos gnyis po 'di dang ldan na/ byang chub
232a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khams gsum la sems skrag pa dang / sems sngangs
232a6(mdo sde): pa dang / sems skyo ba dang / don tu mi gnyer cing mngor bar mi dga' ba dang / ma chags ma zhen pa dang / khams gsum la yid skyobs khams gsum las gzhan du sems cad sdug
232a7(mdo sde): bsngal ba rnams thar bar bya'o zhes brtsor zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par sgrub pa yin te/ gzhon du chos gsum po 'di dag dang ldan na/ byang chub
232b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang gzhon du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang cing chos yongs su tshol bas mi ngoms pa yin/
232b2(mdo sde): mang du thos shing 'jigs pa med pa yin/ chos 'dod cing chos lhur byed pa yin te/ rnyed pa dang bkur bsti ltar byed pa ma yin/ shes kyi khe lhur byed pa ma yin/ phan pa'i dngos po sdom du
232b3(mdo sde): 'gro ba'i sems kyis chos ji skad du thos pa dang / ji ltar khong du chud pa gzhan la rgya cher 'chad cing rab tu ston pa yin te/ shes kyi khe 'dod pas ni ma yin gyi/ ci nas sems can 'di rnams
232b4(mdo sde): chos 'di dag thos nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur snyam ste/ gzhon du chos bzhi po 'di dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
232b5(mdo sde): chen pos ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob par 'gyur ro// gzhon nu chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam
232b6(mdo sde): par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur te/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// gzhon nu rnam grangs 'dis ting nge 'dzin 'di ji ltar sangs
232b7(mdo sde): rgyas mang pos bshad pa/ sangs rgyas mang pos bsngags pa/ sangs rgyas mang pos yang dag par rab tu bstan pa/ sangs rgyas mang pos rab tu bstan pa yin te/ gzhon nu sangs rgyas
233a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das mang po'i drung ngung rab tu byung nas/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di rgya cher mnyan te bzung ngo //
233a2(mdo sde): dris shing bcangs so// bklags so// bton to// nyon mongs pa med pa'i skom pas bsgoms shing mang du byas so// gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan to// de nas bcom
233a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas mang po nges par brjod pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo sngon byung ba'i gtam bstan pa 'di de'i tshe/ zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis rgya cher
233a4(mdo sde): yang dag par rab tu bstan pa// dran pa bskal pa gzhal med dpag yas na// rgyal ba dbyangs kyi yan lag sgra byung ste// bde gshegs dbyangs kyi yan lag sgra de yi// tshe tshad lo yang
233a5(mdo sde): brgya phrag drug cur gyur// de yi pha rol sangs rgyas gzhan byung ba// mi mchog mtshan ni ye shes dbang phyug ste// rkang gnyis btso bo ye shes dbang phyug gi/ tshe tshad lo grangs stong phrag ba
233a6(mdo sde): gnyis so// ye shes dbang phyug pha rol sangs rgyas ni// gzi brjid dbang phyug ces bya rgyal ba byung // rkang gnyis gtso bo gzi brjid dbang phyug gi// tshe tshang lo ni stong phrag drug cu
233a7(mdo sde): bdur/ gzi brjid dbang phyug pha rol sangs rgyas ni/ blo gros dbang phyug ces bya rgyal ba byung // rkang gnyis gtso bo blo gros dbang phyug gi/ tshe yi tshad ni lo grangs bye bar yang // rngo gros
233b1(mdo sde): dbang phyug pa rol sangs rgyas ni tshangs pa'i dbang phyug ces bya d+has bzung / yang gnyis gtsu ba tshangs pa'i dbang phyug gi tshe yi tshang nas gri ba'i stong gyur tshangs pa'i dbang thug pa
233b2(mdo sde): romasangs rgyas ni/ me yi dbang phyug ces bya rgyal ba byung / rkang gnyis gtso bo me yi dbang phyug gi/ tshe tshang lo mangs bdun khri drug stong gyur/ me yi dbang phyug pha rol sangs rgyas me
233b3(mdo sde): tshangs pa'i zhal zhes bya ba rgyal ba byung // rkang gnyis gtso bo tshangs pa'i zhal de yi// tshe yi tshad ni nyin zhag mdun du gyur// tshangs pa'i zhal gyi pha rol sangs rgyas ni// tshogs kyi dbang phyug ces
233b4(mdo sde): bya rgyal ba byung // rkang gnyis gtso bo tshogs kyi dbang phyug gi/ tshe yi tshad ni lo grangs bye bar tshang // tshogs kyi dbang phyug pha rol sangs rgyas ni// dbyangs kyi dbang phyug ces bya rgyal ba byung
233b5(mdo sde): rkang gnyis gtso bo dbyangs kyi dbang phyug ni// tshe tshad lo grangs bye ba phrag dgur tshangs// dbyangs kyi dbang phyug pha rol sangs rgyas ni// dbyangs kyi zhal zhes bya ba rgyal ba byung // rkang gnyis
233b6(mdo sde): gtso bo dbyangs kyi zhal gyi yang // tshe tshad lo grangs bye ba phrag bcur tshangs// dbyangs kyi zhal gyi pha rol sangs rgyas ni// zla ba'i zhal zhes bya ba rgyal ba byung // rkang gnyis gtso bo zla ba'i
233b7(mdo sde): zhal gyis ni// tshe yi tshad kyang nyi ma zhag gcig tu 'gyur/ zla ba'i zhal gyis pha rol sangs rgyas ni/ nyi ma'i zhal zhes bya ba rgyal ba byung / rkang gnyis gtso bo nyi ma'i zhal gyi yab
234a1(mdo sde): tshang mo ni stong phrag bco brgyad do// nyi ma'i zhal gyi pha rol sangs rgyas ni// tshangs pa'i zhal zhes bya ba'i rgyal babyung / sang gnyis btso lo tshangs pa'i zhal gyi yang / tsho tsha/
234a2(mdo sde): lo ni stong phrag ci shu'o// tshangs pa'i zhal gyi pha rol sangs rgyas ni// tshangs pa'i snyan pa zhes bya rgyal ba byung / klung gnyis gtso bo tshangs pa'i snyan pa yi/ tshe tshad lo grangs stong phrag bco brgyad
234a3(mdo sde): gyur// bskal pa gcig la sangs rgyas 'di dag dang // 'jig rten rnam par 'dren pa nyis brgya byung // zil gyi mi non de bzhin gshegs pa yi// mtshan rnams 'dir yang brjod kyis mtshan par
234a4(mdo sde): gyis// mtha' yas dbyangs dang rnam par grags pa'i dbyangs// rnam par bsgrags pa'i gzi brjid rnam grags sla/ sgra skad rnam grags/ dbyangs mchod pa dang / dbyangs kyi yan lag
234a5(mdo sde): dpa' dang dbyangs dag dang // ye shes stobs dang ye shes bye brag 'gro// zil gyis mnon ye shes yang dag 'phags// ye shes 'od 'phro ye shes mngon par 'phags// ye shes rnam grangs/
234a6(mdo sde): de bzhin ye shes dpa'// tshangs pa'i stobs dang tshangs nor tshangs pa'i mchog/ tshangs pa'i lhar bcas de bzhin tshangs pa'i dbyangs// tshangs pa'i dbang phyug tshangs pa'i mi dbang spyan/
234a7(mdo sde): tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs yan lag tshangs pas byin// gzi brjid stobs dang gzi ldan gzi brjid mchog/ gzi brjid dbang phyug gzi brjid mngon par 'phags// gzi brjid khyab dang gzi brjid
234b1(mdo sde): shin tu nges// gami brjid sna dbang shin tu rnam grangs gzi// 'jigs brtsan stobs dang 'jigs brgya mtho gros dang / shin tu 'jigs brtsan 'jigs zhal 'jigs bcan 'phags/
234b2(mdo sde): 'jigs brtsan 'od 'phro 'jigs mchog 'jigs pa'i dbyangs// 'jig rten rnam 'dzin rgyal ba 'di dag byung // sgra dbyangs zab mo dang ni dpal 'dzin dang // rnam dag sna yi dbang phyug
234b3(mdo sde): gtsang ma'i dbyangs// mtha' yas dbyangs dang shin tu rnam grol dbyangs// bdud kyi stobs dang bdud rnams skrag byed dang // spyan zangs dang ni zhal gtsang spyan dag dang // rnam par dag pa'i
234b4(mdo sde): spyan dang mtha' yas spyan// kun nas spyan dang rnam par grags pa'i spyan// spyan gyis zil gyis mnon dang ma smad spyan// dul mchog rdul dang shin tu dul ba'i sems// dul rab zhi pa'i
234b5(mdo sde): dbang po zhi ba'i yid// zhi ba'i bla man dpal rab tu ni// zhi ba'i pha rol phyin dang zhi bar dpa'// bla mar gnas pa zhi ba dul bar sems// shin du dul dngani dbang zhi ba'i ming/ ni
234b6(mdo sde): ba'i bla ma zhi ba'i dpal 'bar ba// zhi ba rab zhi dbang phyug zhi bar dpa'// tshogs dbang tshogs gtso tshogs kyi dbang phyug dang // tshogs rnams zil gnon tshogs bzang ye shes gtsang /
234b7(mdo sde): tshogs kyi dbang chen tshogs dbang dpa' bo dang // gzhan yang tshogs bzang rab tu rnam par 'byed// chos kyi rgyal mtshan de bzhin chos kyi tog/ chos kyi tha ma chos kyi rang bzhin 'phags/
235a1(mdo sde): chos kyi stobs ldan chos dbang dpa' bo dang // rang bzhin chos kyi bla ma nges pa byung // rang bzhin chos kyi bla ma nges par ni// mtshan gcig pa yang bye phrag brgyad
235a2(mdo sde): cu ste// bskal pa gnyis la 'dren pa 'di dag byung // byang chub phyir ni 'di dag ngas mchod de// rang bzhin chos kyi bla ma nges pa yi// rgyal ba'i mtshan rnams gang dag nyan byed cing // thos
235a3(mdo sde): nas rnam par grags pa'i mtshan 'dzin na// de dag myur du ting 'dzin 'di thob 'gyur// / 'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i do// bam po drug pa//
235a4(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas mang po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo sngon byung ba'i le'u 'di zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la rgya cher rgyas par rab tu bstan to// sangs rgyas 'di dag gi yang pha rol
235a5(mdo sde): na bskal pa bsam yas dpag tu med pa'i tshe// lha mis mchod pa sangs rgyas gzhan zhig byung // de yi mtshan ni mi dbang dbyangs zhes bya// de bzhin gshegs pa mi dbang dbyangs kyis ni//
235a6(mdo sde): tshe tshad lo grangs bdun khri drug stong ste// nyan thos dag ni bye ba brgya phrag gsum// de yi 'dus pa dang por gyur pa yin// mngon shes drug ldan gsum rig dbang po thul// mthu yang
235a7(mdo sde): che zhing rdzu 'phrul chen po ste// zag pa zad pa tha ma'i lus 'dzin pa// 'od mdzad kyi ni dge 'dun de tshe byung // bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag brgyad cu yi// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshogs
235b1(mdo sde): byung ngo // bro gros bab cing grags pa shin tu rtse/ mthu yang che zhing rdzu 'phrul che bar gyur/ mngon par shes pa thob cing spobs par ldan// sdong pa thams cad rtogs par khong du chud// nga /
235b2(mdo sde): ni bye bar de las lhag pa yang // gad+hA'i bye ma snyed du 'phrul gyis 'gro// rkang gnyis gtso la dri brdzis nas ni// phyir yang rgyal ba de yi drung du 'ong / mdo sde sgrub pa nges pa'i tshig la mkhas// sngar
235b3(mdo sde): par gyur pa sa yi steng na d+ha// sems can don phyir spyad pa rnam spyod de// bde bar gshegs pa'i sras po mthu chen ni// 'dod pa'i rkyen gyis sdig pa mi byed de// de dag la ni lha yang smon pa
235b4(mdo sde): skyed// srid pa'i 'gro bar mi gnas don mi gnyer// mnyam gzhag bsam gtan gnas pa'i spyod yul can// rnam par nges pa'i don ldan 'jigs med pa// dri ma med par rtag tu tshangs
235b5(mdo sde): par spyod// tshig kyang rgyun mi 'chad cing spobs par ldan// nges tshig bstan pa'i tshig gi don la mkhas// sangs rgyas sras po kun tu yang dag ston// dge ba'i las rnams kyis kyang
235b6(mdo sde): yongs su bzung // bskal pa mtha' yas par ni spyod pas 'phags// 'dren pa dag gis rtag tu bstod cing bsngags// rnam par thar dang don tshigs yang dag ston// tshul khrims/
235b7(mdo sde): shin tu dag cing nyon mongs med// chu yi pad+ma bzhin du mi chags te// khams gsum las mi rnam grol bag yod pa// 'jig rten chos brgyad dag gis mi gos shing // lus kyang rnam dag las/
236a1(mdo sde): kyang yongs su dag/ 'dod pa nyung zhing chos shes mthu yang che// chags pa med cing sangs rgyas yon tan gnas// sems can kun gyi rten dang dpung gnyen te/
236a2(mdo sde): tshig tsam ma yin nan tan snying por byed// gang la gnas pa de nyid gzhan la ston// sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang yongs su bzung // rgyal ba rnams kyi mngon 'dzin thugs brtan pa// khams
236a3(mdo sde): gsum thams cad la yang skrag pa'i yid// rab tu sems zhi rtag tu dgon par spyad// 'jig rten 'dren pa rnams kyis byin rlabs pas/ mdo sde bye ba phrag spyong 'chad par byed/
236a4(mdo sde): 'chad pa de yang sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsngags// 'jig rten dag gi tshig kun rnam spangs te// stong pa nyid la mos shing dam ston// bsngags pa mtha' yas yon tan rgya mtsho bzhin
236a5(mdo sde): mang du thos shing mkhas pa shes rab ldan// gzhon nu bskal pa bye ba mang por ni// rgyun chad med par sngags pa rab brjod kyang // de ni cung zad tsam zhig brjod par 'gyur// rgya mtsho las/
236a6(mdo sde): ni chu thigs gcig po bzhin// de tshe mi yi dbang po'i dbyangs de ni// ting 'dzin zhi ba mthong dka' 'di ston te// stong gsum chen po'i 'jig rten khams 'di yang // lha dang klu rnams
236a7(mdo sde): kyis ni gang bar gyur// de yis ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di bshad tsho// sa yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos// lha dang mi rnams gang+gA'i bye ma snyed// sangs rgyas ye shes la ni mi ldog gnas// ner yang
236b1(mdo sde): mi dbang rgyal po byung ba ni// dpal gyi stobs shes bya ba mthu che ba// de la bu yang brgya phrag lnga yod de// byad bzhin bzang zhing mdzes la blta na sdug/ rgyam po de yi btsun mo'i 'khor kyang ni/
236b2(mdo sde): bud med bye ba brgya phrag brgyad cu yod// sa bdag rgyal po de yi bu mo yang // bye ba stong phrag bcu bzhir tshang bar byung // de yang ston zla ba rlung nya ba la// yum pag brgyad ldan gso sbyong bzung
236b3(mdo sde): nas na/ bye ba khrag khrig brgyad cu lhan cig tu// 'jig rten gtso bo'i drung du nye bar 'ongs// rkang gnyis gtso bo'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal te// rgyal ba de yi spyan sngar rgyal po 'dug rgyal po
236b4(mdo sde): de yi lhag pa'i bsam mkhyen nas// ting 'dzin 'di ni rkang gnyis dbang pos bshad// ting 'dzin 'di ni rgyal po des thos nas// rgyal srid mchil ma bzhin du kun spangs te//
236b5(mdo sde): gnyen dang rtsa lag sdug pa yongs btang nas// rgyal ba de yi drung du rab tu byung // bu yang brgya phrag lnga dag rab byung ste// de bzhin btsun mo'i 'khor dang sras mo dang // gnyen bshes
236b6(mdo sde): rtsa lag mang po gzhan dag kyang // bye ba khrag khrig bdun cu rtsa drug byung // bu dang chung mar bcas pa rab byung nas// kha zas bsgrub pa'i sa yang bor nas ni// rgyun mi chad par lo brgyad
236b7(mdo sde): bar du bcags// 'chag cing 'greng bzhin 'chi ba'i dus kyang byas// rgyal po'i glang po ting 'dzin sems dpa' de// rtag par rab tu mnyam gzhag dus byas pas// de yang rgyal po'i pho
237a1(mdo sde): drang der skyes te// mngal gyi dri mas mgos rdzus te byung // de yi pha ni brtan pa'i stobs shes bya// blo gros che zhes bya ba mar gyur te// gzhon nu btsas ma thag tu/
237a2(mdo sde): tshig smra ba// 'jig rten mgon po de nyid bzhugs sam ge/ 'jig rten mgon po'i bdag gis sems mkhyen nas// de phyir bdag la zhi ba'i ting 'dzin bshad// rkyen rnams med cing
237a3(mdo sde): rkyen dang bral ba yang // srid pa'i 'gro ba rnams ni gcig tu bstan// chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin phyag rgya gang // mdo sde bye ba khrag khrig byung ba gang // byang chub sems dpa'i nor ni bla
237a4(mdo sde): med pa// ting 'dzin 'di ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam// lus kyang gtsang zhing de bzhin dag gtsang ba// sems gtsang de bzhin lta ba gtsang ma dang // dmigs pa rnams las yang dag
237a5(mdo sde): 'da' ba yi// ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam// chud mi za ba'i 'bras bu chos bstan pa// lam mchog yan lag brgyad ldan bsgom pa ste// de bzhin gshegs dang phrad cing
237a6(mdo sde): shes rab no// bden la 'jug dang rtag tu chos shes pa// phung po yongs shes khams rnams mnyam pa nyid// skye mched rnam pa kun tu bsal ba ste// skye ba med pa mngon gsum 'jug/
237a7(mdo sde): pa dag/ ting 'dzin de ni rgyal ba'i bshad mdzad dam// so so yang dag rig pa bzhi la 'jug/ yi ge thams cad dbye ba'i ye shes dang // dngos por 'dzu pa las ni 'da' ba yi// ting
